31#include "PreRTS.h" // This must go first in EVERY cpp file int the GameEngine

49#include "Common/XferCRC.h"

51
52#include "GameClient/Anim2D.h"
53#include "GameClient/ControlBar.h"
54#include "GameClient/Drawable.h"
55#include "GameClient/Eva.h"

59#include "GameLogic/AI.h"

68#include "GameLogic/Module/BehaviorModule.h"
69#include "GameLogic/Module/BodyModule.h"
70#include "GameLogic/Module/CollideModule.h"
71#include "GameLogic/Module/ContainModule.h"
72#include "GameLogic/Module/CountermeasuresBehavior.h"
73#include "GameLogic/Module/CreateModule.h"
74#include "GameLogic/Module/DamageModule.h"
75#include "GameLogic/Module/DeletionUpdate.h"
76#include "GameLogic/Module/DestroyModule.h"
77#include "GameLogic/Module/DieModule.h"
78#include "GameLogic/Module/DozerAIUpdate.h"
79#include "GameLogic/Module/ObjectDefectionHelper.h"
80#include "GameLogic/Module/ObjectRepulsorHelper.h"
81#include "GameLogic/Module/ObjectSMCHelper.h"
82#include "GameLogic/Module/ObjectWeaponStatusHelper.h"
83#include "GameLogic/Module/OverchargeBehavior.h"
84#include "GameLogic/Module/PhysicsUpdate.h"
85#include "GameLogic/Module/PowerPlantUpgrade.h"

120#ifdef DEBUG_OBJECT_ID_EXISTS
121ObjectID TheObjectIDToDebug = INVALID_ID;
122#endif
123
124// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
125static const ModelConditionFlags s_allWeaponFireFlags[WEAPONSLOT_COUNT] =
126{
127 MAKE_MODELCONDITION_MASK5(
128 MODELCONDITION_FIRING_A,
129 MODELCONDITION_BETWEEN_FIRING_SHOTS_A,
130 MODELCONDITION_RELOADING_A,
131 MODELCONDITION_PREATTACK_A,
132 MODELCONDITION_USING_WEAPON_A
133 ),
134 MAKE_MODELCONDITION_MASK5(
135 MODELCONDITION_FIRING_B,
136 MODELCONDITION_BETWEEN_FIRING_SHOTS_B,
137 MODELCONDITION_RELOADING_B,
138 MODELCONDITION_PREATTACK_B,
139 MODELCONDITION_USING_WEAPON_B
140 ),
141 MAKE_MODELCONDITION_MASK5(
142 MODELCONDITION_FIRING_C,
143 MODELCONDITION_BETWEEN_FIRING_SHOTS_C,
144 MODELCONDITION_RELOADING_C,
145 MODELCONDITION_PREATTACK_C,
146 MODELCONDITION_USING_WEAPON_C
147 )
148};
149
150//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
151extern void addIcon(const Coord3D *pos, Real width, Int numFramesDuration, RGBColor color);
152
153//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
154//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
155#ifdef DEBUG_LOGGING
156AsciiString DescribeObject(const Object *obj)
157{
158 if (!obj)
159 return "<No Object>";
160
161 AsciiString ret;
162
163 if (obj->getName().isNotEmpty())
164 {
165 ret.format("Object %d (%s) [%s, owned by player %d (%ls)]",
166 obj->getID(), obj->getName().str(), obj->getTemplate()->getName().str(),
167 obj->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerIndex(),
168 obj->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerDisplayName().str());
169 }
170 else
171 {
172 ret.format("Object %d [%s, owned by player %d (%ls)]",
173 obj->getID(), obj->getTemplate()->getName().str(),
174 obj->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerIndex(),
175 obj->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerDisplayName().str());
176 }
177
178 return ret;
179}
180#endif // DEBUG_LOGGING
181
182//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
183//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
184Object::Object( const ThingTemplate *tt, const ObjectStatusMaskType &objectStatusMask, Team *team ) :
185 Thing(tt),
186 m_indicatorColor(0),
187 m_ai(NULL),
188 m_physics(NULL),
189 m_geometryInfo(tt->getTemplateGeometryInfo()),
190 m_containedBy(NULL),
191 m_xferContainedByID(INVALID_ID),
192 m_containedByFrame(0),
193 m_behaviors(NULL),
194 m_body(NULL),
195 m_contain(NULL),
196 m_stealth(NULL),
197 m_partitionData(NULL),
198 m_radarData(NULL),
199 m_drawable(NULL),
200 m_next(NULL),
201 m_prev(NULL),
202 m_team(NULL),
203 m_experienceTracker(NULL),
204 m_firingTracker(NULL),
205 m_repulsorHelper(NULL),
206 m_statusDamageHelper(NULL),
207 m_tempWeaponBonusHelper(NULL),
208 m_subdualDamageHelper(NULL),
209 m_smcHelper(NULL),
210 m_wsHelper(NULL),
211 m_defectionHelper(NULL),
212 m_partitionLastLook(NULL),
213 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook(NULL),
214 m_partitionLastShroud(NULL),
215 m_partitionLastThreat(NULL),
216 m_partitionLastValue(NULL),
217 m_smcUntil(NEVER),
218 m_privateStatus(0),
219 m_formationID(NO_FORMATION_ID),
220 m_isReceivingDifficultyBonus(FALSE),
221 m_singleUseCommandUsed(FALSE),
222 m_scriptStatus(0),
223 m_enteredOrExitedFrame(0),
224 m_visionSpiedMask (PLAYERMASK_NONE),
225 m_numTriggerAreasActive(0)
226{
227#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
228 m_hasDiedAlready = false;
229#endif
230 //Modules have not been created yet!
231 m_modulesReady = false;
232
233 // Force the thing template to use the most overridden version of itself - jkmcd
234 // Note that after this, the object will be using m_template, which forces the usage of the
235 // most overridden version of tt, so this is okay.
236 tt = (const ThingTemplate *) tt->getFinalOverride();
237
238 Int i, modIdx;
239 AsciiString modName;
240
241 //Added By Sadullah Nader
242 //Initializations inserted
243 m_formationOffset.x = m_formationOffset.y = 0.0f;
244 m_iPos.zero();
245 //
246 for (i = 0; i < MAX_PLAYER_COUNT; ++i)
247 {
248 m_visionSpiedBy[i] = 0;
249 }
250
251 for( i = 0; i < DISABLED_COUNT; i++ )
252 {
253 m_disabledTillFrame[ i ] = NEVER;
254 }
255
256 m_weaponBonusCondition = 0;
257 m_curWeaponSetFlags.clear();
258
259 // sanity
260 if( TheGameLogic == NULL || tt == NULL )
261 {
262
263 assert( 0 );
264 return;
265
266 } // end if
267
268 // Object's set of these persist for the life of the object.
269 m_partitionLastLook = newInstance(SightingInfo);
270 m_partitionLastLook->reset();
271 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook = newInstance(SightingInfo);
272 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->reset();
273 m_partitionLastShroud = newInstance(SightingInfo);
274 m_partitionLastShroud->reset();
275 m_partitionLastThreat = newInstance(SightingInfo);
276 m_partitionLastThreat->reset();
277 m_partitionLastValue = newInstance(SightingInfo);
278 m_partitionLastValue->reset();
279
280 // must set ID to zero, since some of these set methods
281 // will cause network messages to be sent
282 // which use this ID.
283 m_id = INVALID_ID;
284 m_producerID = INVALID_ID;
285 m_builderID = INVALID_ID;
286
287 m_status = objectStatusMask;
288 m_layer = LAYER_GROUND;
289
290 m_group = NULL;
291
292 m_constructionPercent = CONSTRUCTION_COMPLETE; // complete by default
293
294 m_visionRange = tt->friend_calcVisionRange();
295 m_shroudClearingRange = tt->friend_calcShroudClearingRange();
296 if( m_shroudClearingRange == -1.0f )
297 m_shroudClearingRange = m_visionRange;// Backwards compatible, and perfectly logical default to assign
298 m_shroudRange = 0.0f;
299
300 m_singleUseCommandUsed = false;
301
302 // assign unique object id
303 setID( TheGameLogic->allocateObjectID() );
304
305 //
306 // allocate any modules we need to, we should keep
307 // this at or near the end of the drawable construction so that we have
308 // all the valid data about the thing when we create the module
309 //
310 Int totalModules = tt->getBehaviorModuleInfo().getCount() + NUM_SLEEP_HELPERS; // need to take into account all the helper modules
311
312 // allocate the publicModule arrays
313// pool[]ify
314 m_behaviors = MSGNEW("ModulePtrs") BehaviorModule*[totalModules + 1];
315 BehaviorModule** curB = m_behaviors;
316 const ModuleInfo& mi = tt->getBehaviorModuleInfo();
317
318 // set m_team to null before the first call, to avoid naughtiness...
319 // If no team is specified in the constructor, then assign the object
320 // to the neutral team.
321 setTeam(team ? team : ThePlayerList->getNeutralPlayer()->getDefaultTeam());
322
323 // the helpers are done first -- even before Behaviors! -- in case a module needs
324 // to call something that uses them.
325 static const NameKeyType smcHelperModuleDataTagNameKey = NAMEKEY( "ModuleTag_SMCHelper" );
326 static ObjectSMCHelperModuleData smcModuleData;
327 smcModuleData.setModuleTagNameKey( smcHelperModuleDataTagNameKey );
328 m_smcHelper = newInstance(ObjectSMCHelper)(this, &smcModuleData);
329 *curB++ = m_smcHelper;
330
331 //Inactive bodies can't take special damage since they can't take damage
332 Bool isInactiveBody = FALSE;
333 for( Int infoIndex = 0; infoIndex < mi.getCount(); ++infoIndex )
334 {
335 modName = mi.getNthName(infoIndex);
336 if (modName.isEmpty())
337 continue;
338
339 if( modName.compare("InactiveBody") == 0 )
340 {
341 isInactiveBody = TRUE;
342 break;
343 }
344 }
345
346 if( !isInactiveBody )
347 {
348 static const NameKeyType statusHelperModuleDataTagNameKey = NAMEKEY( "ModuleTag_StatusDamageHelper" );
349 static StatusDamageHelperModuleData statusModuleData;
350 statusModuleData.setModuleTagNameKey( statusHelperModuleDataTagNameKey );
351 m_statusDamageHelper = newInstance(StatusDamageHelper)(this, &statusModuleData);
352 *curB++ = m_statusDamageHelper;
353
354 static const NameKeyType subdualHelperModuleDataTagNameKey = NAMEKEY( "ModuleTag_SubdualDamageHelper" );
355 static SubdualDamageHelperModuleData subdualModuleData;
356 subdualModuleData.setModuleTagNameKey( subdualHelperModuleDataTagNameKey );
357 m_subdualDamageHelper = newInstance(SubdualDamageHelper)(this, &subdualModuleData);
358 *curB++ = m_subdualDamageHelper;
359 }
360
361 if (TheAI != NULL
362 && TheAI->getAiData()->m_enableRepulsors
363 && isKindOf(KINDOF_CAN_BE_REPULSED))
364 {
365 // if we can ever be a temporary-repulsor, make a repulsor helper. (srj)
366 static const NameKeyType repulsorHelperModuleDataTagNameKey = NAMEKEY( "ModuleTag_RepulsorHelper" );
367 static ObjectRepulsorHelperModuleData repulsorModuleData;
368 repulsorModuleData.setModuleTagNameKey( repulsorHelperModuleDataTagNameKey );
369 m_repulsorHelper = newInstance(ObjectRepulsorHelper)(this, &repulsorModuleData);
370 *curB++ = m_repulsorHelper;
371 }
372
377
378 // shrubbery cannot defect. no, really.
379 if (!tt->isKindOf(KINDOF_SHRUBBERY))
380 {
381 static const NameKeyType defectionModuleDataTagNameKey = NAMEKEY( "ModuleTag_DefectionHelper" );
382 static ObjectDefectionHelperModuleData defectionModuleData;
383 defectionModuleData.setModuleTagNameKey( defectionModuleDataTagNameKey );
384 m_defectionHelper = newInstance(ObjectDefectionHelper)(this, &defectionModuleData);
385 *curB++ = m_defectionHelper;
386 }
387
388 if (tt->canPossiblyHaveAnyWeapon())
389 {
390 // we only need a firingtracker and wshelper if we can possibly have a weapon.
391 static const NameKeyType weaponStatusModuleDataTagNameKey = NAMEKEY( "ModuleTag_WeaponStatusHelper" );
392 static ObjectWeaponStatusHelperModuleData weaponStatusModuleData;
393 weaponStatusModuleData.setModuleTagNameKey( weaponStatusModuleDataTagNameKey );
394 m_wsHelper = newInstance(ObjectWeaponStatusHelper)(this, &weaponStatusModuleData);
395 *curB++ = m_wsHelper;
396
397 static const NameKeyType firingTrackerModuleDataTagNameKey = NAMEKEY( "ModuleTag_FiringTrackerHelper" );
398 static FiringTrackerModuleData firingTrackerModuleData;
399 firingTrackerModuleData.setModuleTagNameKey( firingTrackerModuleDataTagNameKey );
400 m_firingTracker = newInstance(FiringTracker)(this, &firingTrackerModuleData);
401 *curB++ = m_firingTracker;
402
403 static const NameKeyType tempWeaponBonusHelperModuleDataTagNameKey = NAMEKEY( "ModuleTag_TempWeaponBonusHelper" );
404 static TempWeaponBonusHelperModuleData tempWeaponBonusModuleData;
405 tempWeaponBonusModuleData.setModuleTagNameKey( tempWeaponBonusHelperModuleDataTagNameKey );
406 m_tempWeaponBonusHelper = newInstance(TempWeaponBonusHelper)(this, &tempWeaponBonusModuleData);
407 *curB++ = m_tempWeaponBonusHelper;
408 }
409
410 // behaviors are always done first, so they get into the publicModule arrays
411 // before anything else.
412 for (modIdx = 0; modIdx < mi.getCount(); ++modIdx)
413 {
414 modName = mi.getNthName(modIdx);
415 if (modName.isEmpty())
416 continue;
417
418 BehaviorModule* newMod = (BehaviorModule*)TheModuleFactory->newModule(this, modName, mi.getNthData(modIdx), MODULETYPE_BEHAVIOR);
419 *curB++ = newMod;
420
421 BodyModuleInterface* body = newMod->getBody();
422 if (body)
423 {
424 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_body == NULL, ("Duplicate bodies"));
425 m_body = body;
426 }
427
428 ContainModuleInterface* contain = newMod->getContain();
429 if (contain)
430 {
431 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_contain == NULL, ("Duplicate containers"));
432 m_contain = contain;
433 }
434
435 StealthUpdate* stealth = (StealthUpdate*)newMod->getStealth();
436 if ( stealth )
437 {
438 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH( m_stealth == NULL, ("DuplicateStealthUpdates!") );
439 m_stealth = stealth;
440 }
441
442
443 AIUpdateInterface* ai = newMod->getAIUpdateInterface();
444 if (ai)
445 {
446 if( m_ai )
447 {
448 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH( m_ai == NULL, ("%s has more than one AI module. This is illegal!\n", getTemplate()->getName().str()) );
449 }
450 m_ai = ai;
451 }
452
453 static NameKeyType key_PhysicsUpdate = NAMEKEY("PhysicsBehavior");
454 if (newMod->getModuleNameKey() == key_PhysicsUpdate)
455 {
456 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_physics == NULL, ("You should never have more than one Physics module (%s)\n",getTemplate()->getName().str()));
457 m_physics = (PhysicsBehavior*)newMod;
458 }
459 }
460
461 *curB = NULL;
462
463 AIUpdateInterface *ai = getAIUpdateInterface();
464 if (ai) {
465 ai->setAttitude(getTeam()->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_initialTeamAttitude);
466 if (m_team && m_team->getPrototype() && m_team->getPrototype()->getAttackPriorityName().isNotEmpty()) {
467 AsciiString name = m_team->getPrototype()->getAttackPriorityName();
468 const AttackPriorityInfo *info = TheScriptEngine->getAttackInfo(name);
469 if (info && info->getName().isNotEmpty()) {
470 ai->setAttackInfo(info);
471 }
472 }
473 }
474
475 // allocate experience tracker
476 m_experienceTracker = newInstance(ExperienceTracker)(this);
477
478 // If a valid team has been assigned me, then I have a Player I can ask about my starting level
479 const Player* controller = getControllingPlayer();
480 m_experienceTracker->setVeterancyLevel( controller->getProductionVeterancyLevel( getTemplate()->getName() ) );
481
483 for (BehaviorModule** b = m_behaviors; *b; ++b)
484 {
485 (*b)->onObjectCreated();
486 }
487
488 m_numTriggerAreasActive = 0;
489 m_enteredOrExitedFrame = 0;
490 m_isSelectable = tt->isKindOf(KINDOF_SELECTABLE);
491
492 m_healthBoxOffset.zero();// this is used for units that are amorphous, like angry mob
493
494 //Modules have now been completely created!
495 m_modulesReady = true;
496
497 TheRadar->addObject( this );
498
499 // register the object with the GameLogic
500 TheGameLogic->registerObject( this );
501
502 //disable occlusion for some time after object is created to allow them to exit the factory/building.
503 m_safeOcclusionFrame = TheGameLogic->getFrame()+tt->getOcclusionDelay();
504
505
506 m_soleHealingBenefactorID = INVALID_ID;
507 m_soleHealingBenefactorExpirationFrame = 0;
508
509
510
511} // end Object
512
513//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
518//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
519void Object::initObject()
520{
521 // Weapons & Damage -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
522 // Force the initial weapon set to be instantiated & reloaded.
523
524 //GS No Bad Wrong
525 // The flags are constructed to empty, and between then and now they may be set in valid ways by onCreate modules.
526 // We don't want to blow that away. updateWeaponSet is safe to call on its own, so I will move that to the end.
527// m_curWeaponSetFlags.clear();
528// m_weaponSet.updateWeaponSet(this);
529// m_weaponBonusCondition = 0;
530
531 for (int i = 0; i < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++i)
532 m_lastWeaponCondition[i] = WSF_INVALID;
533
534 // emit message announcing object's creation
535 TheGameLogic->sendObjectCreated( this );
536
537 // If I have a valid team assigned, I can run through my Upgrade modules with his flags
538 updateUpgradeModules();
539
540 //If the player has battle plans (America Strategy Center), then apply those bonuses
541 //to this object if applicable. Internally it validates certain kinds of objects.
542 const Player* controller = getControllingPlayer();
543 if (controller)
544 {
545 if (!getReceivingDifficultyBonus() && TheScriptEngine->getObjectsShouldReceiveDifficultyBonus())
546 {
547 setReceivingDifficultyBonus(TRUE);
548 }
549
550 if (controller->getNumBattlePlansActive() > 0)
551 {
552 controller->applyBattlePlanBonusesForObject( this );
553 }
554 }
555
556
557 //For each special power module that we have, add it's type to the specialpower bits. This is
558 //for optimal access later.
559 for (BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m)
560 {
561 SpecialPowerModuleInterface* sp = (*m)->getSpecialPower();
562 if (!sp)
563 continue;
564
565 const SpecialPowerTemplate *spTemplate = sp->getSpecialPowerTemplate();
566 if( spTemplate )
567 {
568 SET_SPECIALPOWERMASK( m_specialPowerBits, spTemplate->getSpecialPowerType() );
569 }
570 }
571
572 // Kris -- All missiles must be projectiles! This is the perfect place to assert them!
573 // srj: yes, but only in debug...
574#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
575 if( !isKindOf( KINDOF_PROJECTILE ) )
576 {
577 if( isKindOf( KINDOF_SMALL_MISSILE ) || isKindOf( KINDOF_BALLISTIC_MISSILE ) )
578 {
579 //Warning only...
580 DEBUG_CRASH( ("Missile %s must also be a KindOf = PROJECTILE in addition to being either a SMALL_MISSILE or PROJECTILE_MISSILE -- call Kris (36844) for questions!", getTemplate()->getName().str() ) );
581 }
582 }
583#endif
584 if (!isKindOf(KINDOF_PROJECTILE) && !isKindOf(KINDOF_INERT)) {
585 // Notify script conditions to update conditions that consider unit counts.
586 // We ignore projectiles cause they are frequently created & destroyed, and are not
587 // of general interest. Normal unit count tests consider tanks or infantry or planes, etc. jba.
588 TheScriptEngine->notifyOfObjectCreationOrDestruction();
589 TheGameLogic->updateObjectsChangedTriggerAreas();
590 }
591
592 // Everything (like weaponSet flags) is inited, so check if the WeaponSet needs to change.
593 m_weaponSet.updateWeaponSet(this);
594
595 if( isKindOf( KINDOF_MINE ) || isKindOf( KINDOF_BOOBY_TRAP ) || isKindOf( KINDOF_DEMOTRAP ) )
596 {
597 ThePlayerList->getNeutralPlayer()->getAcademyStats()->recordMine();
598 }
599}
600
601//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
602//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
603Object::~Object()
604{
605
606 // tell the AI the building is gone
608 TheAI->pathfinder()->removeObjectFromPathfindMap( this );
609
610 if (!isKindOf(KINDOF_PROJECTILE) && !isKindOf(KINDOF_INERT)) {
611 // Notify script conditions to update conditions that consider unit counts.
612 // We ignore projectiles cause they are frequently created & destroyed, and are not
613 // of general interest. Normal unit count tests consider tanks or infantry or planes, etc. jba.
614 TheGameLogic->updateObjectsChangedTriggerAreas();
615 TheScriptEngine->notifyOfObjectCreationOrDestruction();
616 }
617
618 //
619 // remove from radar before we NULL out the team ... the order of ops are critical here
620 // because the radar code will sometimes look at the team info and it is assumed through
621 // the team and player code that the team is valid
622 //
623 if( m_radarData )
624 TheRadar->removeObject( this );
625
626 // emit message announcing object's destruction. Again, order is important; we must do this
627 // before wiping out the team.
628 TheGameLogic->sendObjectDestroyed( this );
629
630 // empty the team
631 setTeam( NULL );
632
633 // Object's set of these persist for the life of the object.
634 m_partitionLastLook->deleteInstance();
635 m_partitionLastLook = NULL;
636 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->deleteInstance();
637 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook = NULL;
638 m_partitionLastShroud->deleteInstance();
639 m_partitionLastShroud = NULL;
640 m_partitionLastThreat->deleteInstance();
641 m_partitionLastThreat = NULL;
642 m_partitionLastValue->deleteInstance();
643 m_partitionLastValue = NULL;
644
645 // remove the object from the partition system if present
646 if( m_partitionData )
647 ThePartitionManager->unRegisterObject( this );
648
649 // if we are in a group, remove us
650 if (m_group)
651 m_group->remove( this );
652
653 // note, do NOT free these, there are just a shadow copy!
654 m_ai = NULL;
655 m_physics = NULL;
656
657 // delete any modules present
658 for (BehaviorModule** b = m_behaviors; *b; ++b)
659 {
660 (*b)->deleteInstance();
661 *b = NULL; // in case other modules call findModule from their dtor!
662 }
663
664 delete [] m_behaviors;
665 m_behaviors = NULL;
666
667 if( m_experienceTracker )
668 m_experienceTracker->deleteInstance();
669
670 m_experienceTracker = NULL;
671
672 // we don't need to delete these, there were deleted on the m_behaviors list
673 m_firingTracker = NULL;
674 m_repulsorHelper = NULL;
675
676 m_statusDamageHelper = NULL;
677 m_tempWeaponBonusHelper = NULL;
678 m_subdualDamageHelper = NULL;
679 m_smcHelper = NULL;
680 m_wsHelper = NULL;
681 m_defectionHelper = NULL;
682
683 // reset id to zero so we never mistaken grab "dead" objects
684 m_id = INVALID_ID;
685
686 // Instead of removing it from the named cache, notify the script engine that it has died.
687 // The script engine will remove it from the cache if necessary. The script engine needs to take
688 // a crack at this in case it is the current "This Object" pointer.
689 TheScriptEngine->notifyOfObjectDestruction(this);
690}
691
692//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
694//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
695void Object::onContainedBy( Object *containedBy )
696{
697 setStatus( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK( OBJECT_STATUS_UNSELECTABLE ) );
698 if (containedBy && containedBy->getContain()->isEnclosingContainerFor(this))
699 setStatus( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK( OBJECT_STATUS_MASKED ) );
700 else
701 clearStatus( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK( OBJECT_STATUS_MASKED ) );
702 m_containedBy = containedBy;
703 m_containedByFrame = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
704
705 handlePartitionCellMaintenance(); // which should unlook me now that I am contained
706
707}
708
709//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
711//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
712void Object::onRemovedFrom( Object *removedFrom )
713{
714 clearStatus( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK2( OBJECT_STATUS_MASKED, OBJECT_STATUS_UNSELECTABLE ) );
715 m_containedBy = NULL;
716 m_containedByFrame = 0;
717
718 handlePartitionCellMaintenance(); // get a clean look, now that I am outdoors, again
719
720}
721
722//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
723//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
724Int Object::getTransportSlotCount() const
725{
726 Int count = getTemplate()->getRawTransportSlotCount();
727 ContainModuleInterface* contain = getContain();
728 if ( contain && contain->isSpecialZeroSlotContainer() )
729 {
730 count = 0;
731 const ContainedItemsList* items = contain->getContainedItemsList();
732 if (items)
733 {
734 for (ContainedItemsList::const_iterator it = items->begin(); it != items->end(); ++it)
735 {
736 count += (*it)->getTransportSlotCount();
737 }
738 }
739 }
740 return count;
741}
742
743//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
745//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
746void Object::onDestroy()
747{
748
749 // This is the old cleanUpContain safeguard. Say goodbye so they don't try to look us up.
750 if( m_containedBy && m_containedBy->getContain() )
751 {
752 m_containedBy->getContain()->removeFromContain( this );
753 }
754
755 //
756 // run the onDelete on all modules present so they each have an opportunity to cleanup
757 // anything they need to ... including talking to any other modules
758 //
759 for (BehaviorModule** b = m_behaviors; *b; ++b)
760 {
761 (*b)->onDelete();
762 }
763
764 //Have to remove ourself from looking as well. RebuildHoleWorkers definately hit here.
765 handlePartitionCellMaintenance();
766} // end onDestroy
767
768//=============================================================================
769//=============================================================================
770void Object::setGeometryInfo(const GeometryInfo& geom)
771{
772 m_geometryInfo = geom;
773 if( m_partitionData )
774 {
775 // if our geometry changes, we unregister and re-register with the partitionmgr
776 // so that our size gets updated appropriately. this shouldn't be a problem
777 // unless setGeometryInfo gets called frequently. (srj)
778 ThePartitionManager->unRegisterObject( this );
779 ThePartitionManager->registerObject( this );
780 }
781
782 if (m_drawable)
783 m_drawable->reactToGeometryChange();
784}
785
786//=============================================================================
787//=============================================================================
788void Object::setGeometryInfoZ( Real newZ )
789{
790 // A Z change only does not need to un/register with the PartitionManager
791 m_geometryInfo.setMaxHeightAbovePosition( newZ );
792
793 if (m_drawable)
794 m_drawable->reactToGeometryChange();
795}
796
797//=============================================================================
798void Object::friend_setUndetectedDefector( Bool status )
799{
800 if (status)
801 m_privateStatus |= UNDETECTED_DEFECTOR;
802 else
803 m_privateStatus &= ~UNDETECTED_DEFECTOR;
804}
805
806//=============================================================================
807void Object::restoreOriginalTeam()
808{
809 if( m_team == NULL || m_originalTeamName.isEmpty() )
810 return;
811
812 Team* origTeam = TheTeamFactory->findTeam(m_originalTeamName);
813 if (origTeam == NULL)
814 {
815 DEBUG_CRASH(("Object original team (%s) could not be found or created! (srj)\n",m_originalTeamName.str()));
816 return;
817 }
818
819 if (m_team == origTeam)
820 {
821 DEBUG_CRASH(("Object appears to still be on its original team, so why are we attempting to restore it? (srj)\n"));
822 return;
823 }
824
825 setTeam(origTeam);
826}
827
828//=============================================================================
829//=============================================================================
830void Object::setTeam( Team *team )
831{
832 // In order to prevent spawning useful units for a player after he dies, we
833 // just assign objects to the neutral player if we try to misbehave.
834 if (team && !team->getControllingPlayer()->isPlayerActive())
835 team = ThePlayerList->getNeutralPlayer()->getDefaultTeam();
836
837 setTemporaryTeam(team);
838 m_originalTeamName = m_team ? m_team->getName() : AsciiString::TheEmptyString;
839}
840
841//=============================================================================
842//=============================================================================
843void Object::setTemporaryTeam( Team *team )
844{
845 const Bool restoring = false;
846 setOrRestoreTeam(team, restoring);
847}
848
849//=============================================================================
850//=============================================================================
851void Object::setOrRestoreTeam( Team* team, Bool restoring )
852{
853 // don't do anything if the team hasn't changed
854 if( m_team == team )
855 return;
856
857 Team* oldTeam = m_team;
858
859 // Before Switch //////////////////////////
860 if (m_team)
861 {
862 if (m_team->isInList_TeamMemberList(this))
863 {
864 m_team->removeFrom_TeamMemberList(this);
865 m_team->getControllingPlayer()->becomingTeamMember(this, false);
866 }
867 }
868
869 // Switch //////////////////////////
870 m_team = team;
871
872 // After Switch //////////////////////////
873 if (m_team)
874 {
875 if (!m_team->isInList_TeamMemberList(this))
876 {
877 m_team->prependTo_TeamMemberList(this);
878 m_team->getControllingPlayer()->becomingTeamMember(this, true);
879 }
880
881 // now, adjust the attitude of the unit to its new team.
882 const TeamPrototype* proto = m_team->getPrototype();
883 if (proto && proto->getTemplateInfo())
884 {
885 AIUpdateInterface *ai = getAIUpdateInterface();
886 if (ai)
887 {
888 ai->setAttitude(proto->getTemplateInfo()->m_initialTeamAttitude);
889 if (proto->getAttackPriorityName().isNotEmpty()) {
890 AsciiString name = proto->getAttackPriorityName();
891 const AttackPriorityInfo *info = TheScriptEngine->getAttackInfo(name);
892 if (info && info->getName().isNotEmpty()) {
893 ai->setAttackInfo(info);
894 }
895 }
896 }
897 }
898 // emit message announcing object's new alliance
899 Drawable *draw = getDrawable();
900 if (draw)
901 draw->changedTeam();
902 }
903
904 // This can't just go in ::defect, because some things just do setTeam. The act of
905 // setting a new team needs to tell the modules and do other important stuff.
906 // And it needs to happen after the switch.
907 if( oldTeam && team && !restoring )
908 onCapture( oldTeam->getControllingPlayer(), team->getControllingPlayer() );
909
910 //
911 // the team changed we have a change in priorities on the radar if we are
912 // a candidate for the radar as it is
913 //
914 if( m_radarData )
915 {
916
917 // removing it and adding it will cause a resort to happen
918 TheRadar->removeObject( this );
919 TheRadar->addObject( this );
920 }
921
922 // Tell TheInGameUI that the object has changed hands
923 Int oldPlayerIndex = (oldTeam)?(oldTeam->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerIndex()):-1;
924 Int newPlayerIndex = (m_team)?(m_team->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerIndex()):-1;
925 if (oldPlayerIndex != newPlayerIndex)
926 TheInGameUI->objectChangedTeam(this, oldPlayerIndex, newPlayerIndex);
927}
928
929//=============================================================================
930enum
931{
932 BOOBY_TRAP_SCAN_RANGE = 25
933};
934Bool Object::checkAndDetonateBoobyTrap(const Object *victim)
935{
936 if( !testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_BOOBY_TRAPPED) )
937 return FALSE;
938
939 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf kindFilter(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_BOOBY_TRAP), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
940 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(this);
941 PartitionFilter *filters[3];
942 filters[0] = &kindFilter;
943 filters[1] = &filterMapStatus;
944 filters[2] = NULL;
945
946 ObjectIterator *iter = ThePartitionManager->iterateObjectsInRange( getPosition(), BOOBY_TRAP_SCAN_RANGE + getGeometryInfo().getBoundingCircleRadius(),
947 FROM_CENTER_2D, filters, ITER_SORTED_NEAR_TO_FAR );
948 MemoryPoolObjectHolder hold(iter);// This is the magic thing that frees the dynamically made iter in its destructor
949
950 Object *ourBoobyTrap = NULL;
951 for( Object *other = iter->first(); other; other = iter->next() )
952 {
953 if( other->getProducerID() == getID() )// Sticky bombs call the thing they are on their producer for just such an occasion
954 {
955 ourBoobyTrap = other;
956 break;
957 }
958 }
959
960 if( ourBoobyTrap )
961 {
962 static NameKeyType key_StickyBombUpdate = NAMEKEY( "StickyBombUpdate" );
963 StickyBombUpdate *update = (StickyBombUpdate*)ourBoobyTrap->findUpdateModule( key_StickyBombUpdate );
964 if( update )
965 {
966 if( victim && ourBoobyTrap->getControllingPlayer()->getRelationship(victim->getTeam()) == ALLIES )
967 return FALSE;// Friends don't touch friends boobies.
968
969 update->detonate();
970 return TRUE;// Booby Trapped status will be cleared by stickybomb, as they set it
971 }
972 }
973
974 return FALSE;
975}
976
977//=============================================================================
978void Object::setStatus( ObjectStatusMaskType objectStatus, Bool set )
979{
980 ObjectStatusMaskType oldStatus = m_status;
981
982 if (set)
983 m_status.set( objectStatus );
984 else
985 m_status.clear( objectStatus );
986
987 if (m_status != oldStatus)
988 {
989 if( set && objectStatus.test( OBJECT_STATUS_REPULSOR ) && m_repulsorHelper != NULL )
990 {
991 // Damaged repulsable civilians scare (repulse) other civs, but only
992 // for a short amount of time... use the repulsor helper to turn off repulsion shortly.
993 m_repulsorHelper->sleepUntil(TheGameLogic->getFrame() + 2*LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND);
994 }
995
996 if( objectStatus.test( OBJECT_STATUS_STEALTHED ) || objectStatus.test( OBJECT_STATUS_DETECTED ) || objectStatus.test( OBJECT_STATUS_DISGUISED ) )
997 {
998 //Kris: Aug 20, 2003
999 //When any of the three key status bits for stealth go on or off, then handle partition updates for vision.
1000 if( getTemplate()->getShroudRevealToAllRange() > 0.0f )
1001 {
1002 handlePartitionCellMaintenance();
1003 }
1004 }
1005
1006
1007 // when an object's construction status changes, it needs to have its partition data updated,
1008 // in order to maintain the shroud correctly.
1009 if( m_status.test( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) != oldStatus.test( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) )
1010 {
1011
1012 // CHECK FOR MINES, AND DETONATE THEM NOW
1013 ObjectIterator *iter =
1014 ThePartitionManager->iteratePotentialCollisions( getPosition(), getGeometryInfo(), getOrientation() );
1015 MemoryPoolObjectHolder hold( iter );
1016 Object *them;
1017 for( them = iter->first(); them; them = iter->next() )
1018 {
1019 if (them->isKindOf( KINDOF_MINE ))
1020 {
1021 //DETONATE ANY ENEMY MINES, OR DELETE FRIENDLY ONES
1022 Relationship r = getRelationship(them);
1023 if (r == ENEMIES)
1024 {
1025 them->kill(); // detonate mine
1026 }
1027 else
1028 {
1029 TheGameLogic->destroyObject(them);
1030 }
1031 }
1032 }// next object
1033
1034 if (m_partitionData)
1035 m_partitionData->makeDirty(true);
1036 }
1037
1038 }
1039
1040}
1041
1042//=============================================================================
1043void Object::setScriptStatus( ObjectScriptStatusBit bit, Bool set )
1044{
1045 UnsignedInt oldScriptStatus = m_scriptStatus;
1046
1047 if( set )
1048 {
1049 m_scriptStatus |= bit;
1050 }
1051 else
1052 {
1053 m_scriptStatus &= ~bit;
1054 }
1055
1056 if( m_scriptStatus != oldScriptStatus )
1057 {
1058 if( (m_scriptStatus & OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_DISABLED) != (oldScriptStatus & OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_DISABLED) )
1059 {
1060 if( m_partitionData )
1061 {
1062 // if an object becomes disabled or unpowered, then you have to update its partition data because it will
1063 // change how far it can see.
1064 m_partitionData->makeDirty(true);
1065 }
1066 if( m_scriptStatus & OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_DISABLED )
1067 {
1068 //I am now disabled, so tell the main game engine!
1069 setDisabled( DISABLED_SCRIPT_DISABLED );
1070 }
1071 else
1072 {
1073 //I am no longer disabled, so tell the main game engine!
1074 clearDisabled( DISABLED_SCRIPT_DISABLED );
1075 }
1076 }
1077 if( (m_scriptStatus & OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_UNPOWERED) != (oldScriptStatus & OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_UNPOWERED) )
1078 {
1079 if( m_partitionData )
1080 {
1081 // if an object becomes disabled or unpowered, then you have to update its partition data because it will
1082 // change how far it can see.
1083 m_partitionData->makeDirty(true);
1084 }
1085 if( m_scriptStatus & OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_UNPOWERED )
1086 {
1087 //I am now underpowered, so tell the main game engine!
1088 setDisabled( DISABLED_SCRIPT_UNDERPOWERED );
1089 }
1090 else
1091 {
1092 //I am no longer undperpowered, so tell the main game engine!
1093 clearDisabled( DISABLED_SCRIPT_UNDERPOWERED );
1094 }
1095 }
1096 }
1097}
1098
1099//=============================================================================
1100Bool Object::canCrushOrSquish(Object *otherObj, CrushSquishTestType testType ) const
1101{
1102 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(this, ("null this in canCrushOrSquish"));
1103
1104 if( !otherObj )
1105 {
1106 //Can't crush anything.
1107 return false;
1108 }
1109
1110 if( isDisabledByType( DISABLED_UNMANNED ) )
1111 {
1112 //Unmanned vehicles cannot crush troops. This was happening when Jarmen Kell sniped
1113 //the vehicle and booted the guys out while still moving, as the vehicle is now
1114 //on a different team.
1115 return false;
1116 }
1117
1118 UnsignedByte crusherLevel = getCrusherLevel();
1119
1120 // order matters: we want to know if I consider it to be an ally, not vice versa
1121 if( getRelationship( otherObj ) == ALLIES )
1122 {
1123 //Friends don't let friends crush friends.
1124 return false;
1125 }
1126
1127 if( !crusherLevel )
1128 {
1129 //Can't crush anything!
1130 return false;
1131 }
1132
1133 //Test this case for generic infantry getting squished by vehicles!
1134 if( testType == TEST_SQUISH_ONLY || testType == TEST_CRUSH_OR_SQUISH )
1135 {
1136
1137 //****************************************************************************************
1138 //NOTE: This section of code is used by the pathfinder to determine if the object should
1139 // move to the target. I don't think it's the right place to check for this because
1140 // the semantics check to see if we can squish something -- not approach it. However
1141 // I'm not moving it for fear of some major breakage! -- KM
1142 //Bool squisher = crusherLevel > 0;
1143 //if( !squisher )
1144 //{
1145 // Weapon *weapon = getCurrentWeapon();
1146 // if( weapon && weapon->isContactWeapon() )
1147 // {
1148 // squisher = true;
1149 // }
1150 //}
1151 //if( squisher )
1152 //NOTE2: *** IF YOU REENABLE THIS CODE -- Move the "if( !crusherLevel ) return false" below
1153 // this squish section.
1154 //****************************************************************************************
1155 {
1156 // See if other is squishable
1157 static NameKeyType key_squish = NAMEKEY( "SquishCollide" );
1158 if( otherObj->findModule( key_squish ) )
1159 {
1160 return true; // squishable.
1161 }
1162 }
1163 }
1164
1165
1166 UnsignedByte crushableLevel = otherObj->getCrushableLevel();
1167
1168 if( testType == TEST_CRUSH_ONLY || testType == TEST_CRUSH_OR_SQUISH )
1169 {
1170 if( crusherLevel > crushableLevel )
1171 {
1172 return true;
1173 }
1174 }
1175
1176 return false;
1177}
1178
1179//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1180UnsignedByte Object::getCrusherLevel() const
1181{
1182 return getTemplate()->getCrusherLevel();
1183}
1184
1185//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1186UnsignedByte Object::getCrushableLevel() const
1187{
1188 return getTemplate()->getCrushableLevel();
1189}
1190
1191
1192// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1194// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1195void Object::topple( const Coord3D *toppleDirection, Real toppleSpeed, UnsignedInt options )
1196{
1197 static NameKeyType key_ToppleUpdate = NAMEKEY("ToppleUpdate");
1198
1199 ToppleUpdate* toppleUpdate = (ToppleUpdate*)findModule(key_ToppleUpdate);
1200 if( toppleUpdate && toppleUpdate->isAbleToBeToppled() )
1201 {
1202
1203 // apply the topple force
1204 toppleUpdate->applyTopplingForce( toppleDirection, toppleSpeed, options );
1205
1206 } // end if
1207
1208} // end topple
1209

1232}

1236{

1238}

1240//=============================================================================
1241Bool Object::hasAnyWeapon() const
1242{
1243 return m_weaponSet.hasAnyWeapon();
1244}
1245
1246//=============================================================================
1247Bool Object::hasAnyDamageWeapon() const
1248{
1249 //First check to see if we have any weapons -- if not return false.
1250 if( !m_weaponSet.hasAnyDamageWeapon() )
1251 {
1252 return FALSE;
1253 }
1254 return TRUE;
1255}

1259{
1260 return m_weaponSet.getMostPercentReadyToFireAnyWeapon();
1261}
1262
1263//=============================================================================
1264Bool Object::hasWeaponToDealDamageType(DamageType typeToDeal) const
1265{
1266 return m_weaponSet.hasWeaponToDealDamageType(typeToDeal);
1267}
1268
1269//=============================================================================
1270Real Object::getLargestWeaponRange() const
1271{
1272 Real retVal = -1;
1273 for (Int i = PRIMARY_WEAPON; i < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++i) {
1274 Weapon* weapon = m_weaponSet.getWeaponInWeaponSlot((WeaponSlotType)i);
1275 if (!weapon) {
1276 continue;
1277 }
1278
1279 Real tmpVal = weapon->getAttackRange(this);
1280 if (tmpVal > retVal) {
1281 retVal = tmpVal;
1282 }
1283 }
1284 return retVal;
1285}
1286
1287//=============================================================================
1288void Object::setFiringConditionForCurrentWeapon() const
1289{
1290 if (m_drawable)
1291 {
1292 WeaponSlotType wslot = m_weaponSet.getCurWeaponSlot();
1293 ModelConditionFlags c = m_weaponSet.getModelConditionForWeaponSlot(wslot, WSF_FIRING);
1294 m_drawable->clearAndSetModelConditionFlags(s_allWeaponFireFlags[wslot], c);
1295 }
1296}

1300{

1302 {
1303 m_drawable->setModelConditionState(a);
1304 }
1305}

1311 {

1313 }
1314}

1317void Object::clearAndSetModelConditionState( ModelConditionFlagType clr, ModelConditionFlagType set )
1318{

1322 }

1325//=============================================================================
1326void Object::clearModelConditionFlags( const ModelConditionFlags& clr )
1327{

1329 {
1330 m_drawable->clearModelConditionFlags(clr);
1331 }
1332}
1333
1334//=============================================================================
1335void Object::setModelConditionFlags( const ModelConditionFlags& set )
1336{
1337 if (m_drawable)
1338 {
1339 m_drawable->setModelConditionFlags(set);
1340 }
1341}
1342
1343//=============================================================================
1344void Object::clearAndSetModelConditionFlags( const ModelConditionFlags& clr, const ModelConditionFlags& set )
1345{
1346 if (m_drawable)
1347 {
1348 m_drawable->clearAndSetModelConditionFlags(clr, set);
1349 }
1350}
1351
1352//=============================================================================
1353// Special model states are states that are turned on for a period of time, and
1354// turned off automatically -- used for cheer, and scripted special moment
1355// animations. Setting a special state will automatically clear any other
1356// special states that may be turned on so you can only have one at a time.
1357//=============================================================================
1358void Object::setSpecialModelConditionState( ModelConditionFlagType set, UnsignedInt frames )
1359{
1360 clearSpecialModelConditionStates();
1361
1362 setModelConditionState( set );
1363
1364 if( frames == 0 )
1365 {
1366 frames = 1;
1367 }
1368
1369 m_smcUntil = TheGameLogic->getFrame() + frames;
1370 m_smcHelper->sleepUntil(m_smcUntil);
1371}
1372
1373//=============================================================================
1374void Object::clearSpecialModelConditionStates()
1375{
1376 clearModelConditionFlags( MAKE_MODELCONDITION_MASK( MODELCONDITION_SPECIAL_CHEERING ) );
1377 m_smcUntil = NEVER;
1378}
1379

1381//=============================================================================
1382//const ModelConditionFlags& Object::getModelConditionFlags() const
1383//{
1384// if (m_drawable)
1385// {
1386// return m_drawable->getModelConditionFlags();
1387// }
1388// else
1389// {
1390// DEBUG_CRASH(("NULL Drawable at this point, you can't get modelconditionflags now."));
1391// static ModelConditionFlags noFlags;
1392// return noFlags;
1393// }
1394//}
1395
1396//=============================================================================
1397Weapon* Object::getCurrentWeapon(WeaponSlotType* wslot)
1398{
1399 if (!m_weaponSet.hasAnyWeapon())
1400 return NULL;
1401
1402 if (wslot)
1403 *wslot = m_weaponSet.getCurWeaponSlot();
1404 return m_weaponSet.getCurWeapon();
1405}
1406
1407//=============================================================================
1408const Weapon* Object::getCurrentWeapon(WeaponSlotType* wslot) const
1409{
1410 if (!m_weaponSet.hasAnyWeapon())
1411 return NULL;
1412
1413 if (wslot)
1414 *wslot = m_weaponSet.getCurWeaponSlot();
1415 return m_weaponSet.getCurWeapon();
1416}
1417
1418//=============================================================================
1419Weapon* Object::findWaypointFollowingCapableWeapon()
1420{
1421 return m_weaponSet.findWaypointFollowingCapableWeapon();
1422}
1423
1424//=============================================================================
1425Bool Object::getAmmoPipShowingInfo(Int& numTotal, Int& numFull) const
1426{
1428 const Weapon* w = m_weaponSet.findAmmoPipShowingWeapon();
1429 if (w)
1430 {
1431 numTotal = w->getClipSize();
1432 numFull = w->getRemainingAmmo();
1433 return true;
1434 }
1435 else
1436 {
1437 return false;
1438 }
1439}
1440
1441//=============================================================================
1442/*
1443 NOTE: getAbleToAttackSpecificObject NO LONGER internally calls isAbleToAttack(),
1444 since that isn't an incredibly fast call, and this is called repeatedly in some inner loops
1445 where we already know that isAbleToAttack() == true. so you should always
1446 call isAbleToAttack prior to calling this! (srj)
1447*/
1448CanAttackResult Object::getAbleToAttackSpecificObject( AbleToAttackType t, const Object* target, CommandSourceType commandSource, WeaponSlotType specificSlot ) const
1449{
1450 // NO! BAD! WRONG!
1451 // If we can't attack at all, then we cannot attack this
1452 //if (!isAbleToAttack())
1453 // return FALSE;
1454
1455 // Otherwise leave it up to our weapons.
1456 return m_weaponSet.getAbleToAttackSpecificObject( t, this, target, commandSource, specificSlot );
1457}
1458
1459//=============================================================================
1460//Used for base defenses and otherwise stationary units to see if you can attack a position potentially out of range.
1461CanAttackResult Object::getAbleToUseWeaponAgainstTarget( AbleToAttackType attackType, const Object *victim, const Coord3D *pos, CommandSourceType commandSource, WeaponSlotType specificSlot ) const
1462{
1463 return m_weaponSet.getAbleToUseWeaponAgainstTarget( attackType, this, victim, pos, commandSource, specificSlot );
1464}
1465
1466
1467//=============================================================================
1468Bool Object::chooseBestWeaponForTarget(const Object* target, WeaponChoiceCriteria criteria, CommandSourceType cmdSource )
1469{
1470 return m_weaponSet.chooseBestWeaponForTarget(this, target, criteria, cmdSource );
1471}
1472
1473//DECLARE_PERF_TIMER(fireCurrentWeapon)
1474//=============================================================================
1475void Object::fireCurrentWeapon(Object *target)
1476{
1477 //USE_PERF_TIMER(fireCurrentWeapon)
1478
1479 // victim may have already been destroyed
1480 if (target == NULL)
1481 return;
1482
1483 Weapon* weapon = m_weaponSet.getCurWeapon();
1484 if (weapon && (weapon->getStatus() == READY_TO_FIRE))
1485 {
1486 Bool reloaded = weapon->fireWeapon(this, target);
1487 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_firingTracker, ("hey, we are firing but have no firing tracker. this is wrong."));
1488 if (m_firingTracker)
1489 m_firingTracker->shotFired(weapon, target->getID());
1490 if (reloaded)
1491 releaseWeaponLock(LOCKED_TEMPORARILY); // release any temporary locks.
1492
1493 friend_setUndetectedDefector( FALSE );// My secret is out
1494 }
1495}
1496
1497//=============================================================================
1498void Object::fireCurrentWeapon(const Coord3D* pos)
1499{
1500 //USE_PERF_TIMER(fireCurrentWeapon)
1501
1502 if (pos == NULL)
1503 return;
1504
1505 Weapon* weapon = m_weaponSet.getCurWeapon();
1506 if (weapon && (weapon->getStatus() == READY_TO_FIRE))
1507 {
1508 Bool reloaded = weapon->fireWeapon(this, pos);
1509 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_firingTracker, ("hey, we are firing but have no firing tracker. this is wrong."));
1510 if (m_firingTracker)
1511 m_firingTracker->shotFired(weapon, INVALID_ID);
1512 if (reloaded)
1513 releaseWeaponLock(LOCKED_TEMPORARILY); // release any temporary locks.
1514
1515 friend_setUndetectedDefector( FALSE );// My secret is out
1516 }
1517}
1518
1519//==============================================================================
1520void Object::notifyFiringTrackerShotFired( const Weapon* weaponFired, ObjectID victimID )
1521{
1522 if ( m_firingTracker )
1523 m_firingTracker->shotFired( weaponFired, victimID );
1524}
1525
1526
1527//=============================================================================
1528void Object::preFireCurrentWeapon( const Object *victim )
1529{
1530 Weapon* weapon = m_weaponSet.getCurWeapon();
1531
1532 //If we are going to be capable of firing our weapon NEXT frame, set the pre-attack
1533 //up now. This gets called by AIAttackFireWeaponState::onEnter().. but the update happens
1534 //next frame.
1535 if (weapon && TheGameLogic->getFrame() + 1 >= weapon->getPossibleNextShotFrame() )
1536 {
1537 weapon->preFireWeapon( this, victim );
1538 friend_setUndetectedDefector( FALSE );// My secret is out
1539 }
1540}
1541
1542// ============================================================================
1544// ============================================================================
1545UnsignedInt Object::getLastShotFiredFrame() const
1546{
1547 UnsignedInt recent = 0;
1548 for (int i = 0; i < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++i)
1549 {
1550 const Weapon* w = m_weaponSet.getWeaponInWeaponSlot((WeaponSlotType)i);
1551 if (w)
1552 {
1553 UnsignedInt when = w->getLastShotFrame();
1554 if (when > recent)
1555 recent = when;
1556 }
1557 }
1558 return recent;
1559}
1560
1561// ============================================================================
1563// ============================================================================
1564ObjectID Object::getLastVictimID() const
1565{
1566 return m_firingTracker ? m_firingTracker->getLastShotVictim() : INVALID_ID;
1567}
1568
1569//=============================================================================
1570// Object::getRelationship
1571//=============================================================================
1572Relationship Object::getRelationship(const Object *that) const
1573{
1574 const Team *myTeam = getTeam();
1575
1576 if (myTeam && that)
1577 {
1578 if (getIsUndetectedDefector())
1579 {
1580 return NEUTRAL; // so my AI does not give away my position by auto acquire
1581 }
1582 else if (that->getIsUndetectedDefector())
1583 {
1584 return ALLIES; // so I treat undetecteddefectors like they were my very own
1585 }
1586 else
1587 {
1588 return myTeam->getRelationship( that->getTeam() );
1589 }
1590 }
1591
1592 return NEUTRAL;
1593
1594}
1595
1596//=============================================================================
1597// Object::getControllingPlayer
1598//=============================================================================
1599Player * Object::getControllingPlayer() const
1600{
1601 const Team* myTeam = this->getTeam();
1602 if (myTeam)
1603 return myTeam->getControllingPlayer();
1604
1605 return NULL;
1606}
1607
1608//=============================================================================
1609void Object::setProducer(const Object* obj)
1610{
1611 m_producerID = obj ? obj->getID() : INVALID_ID;
1612// seems like a good idea, but is not. (srj)
1613// if (obj)
1614// m_indicatorColor = obj->m_indicatorColor;
1615}
1616
1617//=============================================================================
1618void Object::setBuilder( const Object *obj )
1619{
1620
1621 m_builderID = obj ? obj->getID() : INVALID_ID;
1622
1623}
1624
1625//=============================================================================
1626void Object::setCustomIndicatorColor(Color c)
1627{
1628 if (m_indicatorColor != c)
1629 {
1630 m_indicatorColor = c;
1631 if (m_drawable)
1632 m_drawable->changedTeam();
1633 }
1634}
1635
1636//=============================================================================
1637void Object::removeCustomIndicatorColor()
1638{
1639 setCustomIndicatorColor(0);
1640}
1641
1642//=============================================================================
1643// Object::getIndicatorColor
1644//=============================================================================
1645Color Object::getIndicatorColor() const
1646{
1647 if (m_indicatorColor == 0)
1648 {
1649 const Team *myTeam = getTeam();
1650 if (myTeam)
1651 {
1652 const Player* p = myTeam->getControllingPlayer();
1653 if (p)
1654 {
1655 return p->getPlayerColor();
1656 }
1657 }
1658 return GameMakeColor(0, 0, 0, 255);
1659 }
1660 else
1661 {
1662 return m_indicatorColor;
1663 }
1664}
1665
1666//=============================================================================
1667// Object::getNightIndicatorColor - used to make blue/purple easier to see on night models.
1668//=============================================================================
1669Color Object::getNightIndicatorColor() const
1670{
1671 if (m_indicatorColor == 0)
1672 {
1673 const Team *myTeam = getTeam();
1674 if (myTeam)
1675 {
1676 const Player* p = myTeam->getControllingPlayer();
1677 if (p)
1678 {
1679 return p->getPlayerNightColor();
1680 }
1681 }
1682 return GameMakeColor(0, 0, 0, 255);
1683 }
1684 else
1685 {
1686 return m_indicatorColor;
1687 }
1688}
1689
1690//=============================================================================
1691// Object::isLocallyControlled
1692//=============================================================================
1693Bool Object::isLocallyControlled() const
1694{
1695 return getControllingPlayer() == ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer();
1696}
1697
1698//=============================================================================
1699// Object::isLocallyControlled
1700//=============================================================================
1701Bool Object::isNeutralControlled() const
1702{
1703 return getControllingPlayer() == ThePlayerList->getNeutralPlayer();
1704}
1705
1706//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1707inline Bool isPosDifferent(const Coord3D* a, const Coord3D* b)
1708{
1709 // this is necessary because PhysicsBehavior may generate tiny changes even when
1710 // "standing still", due to roundoff errors. It's important that we only invalidate
1711 // the PartitionManager stuff when the pos/orientation really changes (for efficiency purposes)
1712 // so we must put in some cleverness...
1713 const Real THRESH = 0.01f;
1714
1715 if (fabs(a->x - b->x) > THRESH)
1716 return true;
1717
1718 if (fabs(a->y - b->y) > THRESH)
1719 return true;
1720
1721 if (fabs(a->z - b->z) > THRESH)
1722 return true;
1723
1724 return false;
1725}
1726
1727//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1728inline Bool isAngleDifferent(Real a, Real b)
1729{
1730 // this is necessary because PhysicsBehavior may generate tiny changes even when
1731 // "standing still", due to roundoff errors. It's important that we only invalidate
1732 // the PartitionManager stuff when the pos/orientation really changes (for efficiency purposes)
1733 // so we must put in some cleverness...
1734
1735 const Real THRESH = 0.01f; // in radians, this is approx 1/2 degree.
1736
1737 if (fabs(a - b) > THRESH)
1738 return true;
1739
1740 return false;
1741}
1742
1743//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1744void Object::reactToTurretChange( WhichTurretType turret, Real oldRotation, Real oldPitch )
1745{
1746 Real currentRotation = 0.0f;
1747 Real currentPitch = 0.0f;
1748 if( getAI() )
1749 {
1750 getAI()->getTurretRotAndPitch( turret, &currentRotation, &currentPitch );
1751 }
1752 Bool rotationChange = (currentRotation != oldRotation);
1753// Bool pitchChange = (currentPitch != oldPitch);
1754
1755 if( rotationChange )
1756 {
1757 if (getContain())
1758 getContain()->containReactToTransformChange();
1759 }
1760}
1761
1762//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1763//DECLARE_PERF_TIMER(Object_reactToTransformChange)
1764void Object::reactToTransformChange(const Matrix3D* oldMtx, const Coord3D* oldPos, Real oldAngle)
1765{
1766 //USE_PERF_TIMER(Object_reactToTransformChange)
1767 if(_isnan(getPosition()->x) || _isnan(getPosition()->y) || _isnan(getPosition()->z)) {
1768 DEBUG_CRASH(("Object pos is nan."));
1769 TheGameLogic->destroyObject(this);
1770 }
1771 if (m_drawable)
1772 {
1773 m_drawable->setTransformMatrix( this->getTransformMatrix() );
1774 }
1775
1776 Bool posDiff = isPosDifferent(oldPos, getPosition());
1777 Bool angDiff = isAngleDifferent(oldAngle, getOrientation());
1778
1779 if (posDiff || angDiff)
1780 {
1781 if (m_partitionData)
1782 m_partitionData->makeDirty(true);
1783
1784 if (getContain())
1785 getContain()->containReactToTransformChange();
1786 }
1787
1788 if (posDiff)
1789 {
1790 setTriggerAreaFlagsForChangeInPosition(); // Update for entered/exited
1791
1792 Region3D mapExtent;
1793 TheTerrainLogic->getExtent(&mapExtent);
1794 if (mapExtent.isInRegionNoZ(getPosition()))
1795 m_privateStatus &= ~OFF_MAP;
1796 else
1797 m_privateStatus |= OFF_MAP;
1798 }
1799}
1800
1801//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1802ObjectShroudStatus Object::getShroudedStatus(Int playerIndex) const
1803{
1804 if (getTemplate()->isKindOf( KINDOF_ALWAYS_VISIBLE ))
1805 return OBJECTSHROUD_CLEAR;
1806
1807 if (m_partitionData)
1808 return m_partitionData->getShroudedStatus(playerIndex);
1809
1810 // This can happen for objects removed from the partition system (e.g.,
1811 // for soldiers that are garrisoned inside a building).
1812 return OBJECTSHROUD_CLEAR;
1813}
1814
1815//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1817//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1818void Object::attemptDamage( DamageInfo *damageInfo )
1819{
1820 BodyModuleInterface* body = getBodyModule();
1821 if (body)
1822 body->attemptDamage( damageInfo );
1823
1824 // Process any shockwave forces that might affect this object due to the incurred damage
1825 if (damageInfo->in.m_shockWaveAmount > 0.0f && damageInfo->in.m_shockWaveRadius > 0.0f)
1826 {
1827 //KindOfMaskType immuneToShockwaveKindofs; //NEW RESTRICTIONS ADDED
1828 //immuneToShockwaveKindofs.set(KINDOF_PROJECTILE);// projectiles go idle in midair when they get sw'd //NEW RESTRICTIONS ADDED
1829 //immuneToShockwaveKindofs.set(KINDOF_PRODUCED_AT_HELIPAD);//helicopters go all wonky when they get shockwaved //NEW RESTRICTIONS ADDED
1830
1831 PhysicsBehavior *behavior = getPhysics();
1832 if ( behavior && (isAirborneTarget() == FALSE) && (! isKindOf(KINDOF_PROJECTILE) ) )
1833// if (behavior && isAnyKindOf( immuneToShockwaveKindofs ) == FALSE )//NEW RESTRICTIONS ADDED
1834 {
1835 // Calculate the shockwave taperoff amount due to distance from ground zero
1836 Real shockWaveScalar = damageInfo->in.m_shockWaveVector.length();
1837 Real distanceFromCenter = min(1.0f, shockWaveScalar / damageInfo->in.m_shockWaveRadius);
1838 Real distanceTaper = (distanceFromCenter) * (1.0f - damageInfo->in.m_shockWaveTaperOff);
1839 Real shockTaperMult = 1.0f - distanceTaper;
1840
1841 // Set up the shockwave force to use apply on object
1842 Coord3D shockWaveForce;
1843 shockWaveForce.set( &damageInfo->in.m_shockWaveVector );
1844 shockWaveForce.normalize();
1845 shockWaveForce.scale( damageInfo->in.m_shockWaveAmount * shockTaperMult );
1846 shockWaveForce.z = shockWaveForce.length(); // Apply up force equal to the lateral force for dramatic effect
1847
1848 // Apply the shock to the object
1849 behavior->applyShock(&shockWaveForce);
1850
1851 // Add random rotation to the object for drama
1852
1853 behavior->applyRandomRotation();
1854
1855 // Set stunned state due to the shock for the object
1856 behavior->setStunned(true);
1857
1858 setModelConditionState(MODELCONDITION_STUNNED_FLAILING);
1859 }
1860 }
1861
1862
1864
1865 //
1866 // if actual damage occurred, and this is an object owned by the local player we
1867 // might do a radar event for under attack. Note that we do not even try
1868 // to do radar events for DAMAGE_PENALTY as that damage type is a type of damage
1869 // that occurs with explicit player knowledge
1870 //
1871 if( damageInfo->out.m_actualDamageDealt > 0.0f &&
1872 damageInfo->in.m_damageType != DAMAGE_PENALTY &&
1873 damageInfo->in.m_damageType != DAMAGE_HEALING &&
1874 getControllingPlayer() &&
1875 !BitTest(damageInfo->in.m_sourcePlayerMask, getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerMask()) &&
1876 m_radarData != NULL &&
1877 getControllingPlayer() == ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer() )
1878 TheRadar->tryUnderAttackEvent( this );
1879
1880}
1881
1882//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1883void Object::attemptHealing(Real amount, const Object* source)
1884{
1885 BodyModuleInterface* body = getBodyModule();
1886 if (body)
1887 {
1888 DamageInfo damageInfo;
1889 damageInfo.in.m_damageType = DAMAGE_HEALING;
1890 damageInfo.in.m_deathType = DEATH_NONE;
1891 damageInfo.in.m_sourceID = source ? source->getID() : INVALID_ID;
1892 damageInfo.in.m_amount = amount;
1893 body->attemptHealing( &damageInfo );
1894 }
1895}
1896
1897ObjectID Object::getSoleHealingBenefactor( void ) const
1898{
1899 UnsignedInt now = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
1900 if( now > m_soleHealingBenefactorExpirationFrame )
1901 return INVALID_ID;
1902
1903 return m_soleHealingBenefactorID;
1904
1905}
1906
1907Bool Object::attemptHealingFromSoleBenefactor ( Real amount, const Object* source, UnsignedInt duration )
1908{
1909
1910 if( ! source ) // sanity
1911 return FALSE;
1912
1913 UnsignedInt now = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
1914 ObjectID id = source->getID();
1915
1916// Either it is ok to accept healing from any who offer or this is my guy, calling again
1917 if( now > m_soleHealingBenefactorExpirationFrame || m_soleHealingBenefactorID == id )
1918 {
1919 m_soleHealingBenefactorID = id;
1920 m_soleHealingBenefactorExpirationFrame = now + duration;
1921
1922 BodyModuleInterface* body = getBodyModule();
1923 if (body)
1924 {
1925 DamageInfo damageInfo;
1926 damageInfo.in.m_damageType = DAMAGE_HEALING;
1927 damageInfo.in.m_deathType = DEATH_NONE;
1928 damageInfo.in.m_sourceID = source ? source->getID() : INVALID_ID;
1929 damageInfo.in.m_amount = amount;
1930 body->attemptHealing( &damageInfo );
1931 }
1932
1933 return TRUE;
1934 }
1935
1936 return FALSE;
1937
1938}
1939
1940
1941//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1942Real Object::estimateDamage( DamageInfoInput& damageInfo ) const
1943{
1944 BodyModuleInterface* body = getBodyModule();
1945 if (body)
1946 return body->estimateDamage( damageInfo );
1947
1948 return 0.0f;
1949}
1950
1951//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1953//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1954void Object::kill( DamageType damageType, DeathType deathType )
1955{
1956 DamageInfo damageInfo;
1957
1958 // Do unmodifiable damage equal to their max health to kill.
1959 damageInfo.in.m_damageType = damageType;
1960 damageInfo.in.m_deathType = deathType;
1961 damageInfo.in.m_sourceID = INVALID_ID;
1962 damageInfo.in.m_amount = getBodyModule()->getMaxHealth();
1963 damageInfo.in.m_kill = TRUE; // Triggers object to die no matter what.
1964 attemptDamage( &damageInfo );
1965
1966 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(!damageInfo.out.m_noEffect, ("Attempting to kill an unKillable object (InactiveBody?)\n"));
1967
1968} // end kill
1969
1970//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1972//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1973void Object::healCompletely()
1974{
1975 attemptHealing(HUGE_DAMAGE_AMOUNT, NULL);
1976}
1977
1978//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1979//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1980void Object::setEffectivelyDead(Bool dead)
1981{
1982 if (dead)
1983 BitSet(m_privateStatus, EFFECTIVELY_DEAD);
1984 else
1985 BitClear(m_privateStatus, EFFECTIVELY_DEAD);
1986
1987 if (dead)
1988 {
1989 if( m_radarData )
1990 TheRadar->removeObject( this );
1991 }
1992}
1993
1994//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1995void Object::setCaptured(Bool isCaptured)
1996{
1997 if (isCaptured)
1998 BitSet(m_privateStatus, CAPTURED);
1999 else
2000 {
2001 DEBUG_LOG(("Clearing Captured Status. This should never happen. jkmcd"));
2002 BitClear(m_privateStatus, CAPTURED);
2003 }
2004
2005 // No need to see if we should skip updates, this flag has no effect on skipping updates.
2006}
2007
2008
2009
2010//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2011Bool Object::isStructure(void) const
2012{
2013 return isKindOf(KINDOF_STRUCTURE);
2014}
2015
2016//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2017Bool Object::isFactionStructure(void) const
2018{
2019 return isAnyKindOf( KINDOFMASK_FS );
2020}
2021
2022//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2023Bool Object::isNonFactionStructure(void) const
2024{
2025 return isStructure() && !isFactionStructure();
2026}
2027
2028void localIsHero( Object *obj, void* userData )
2029{
2030 Bool *hero = (Bool*)userData;
2031
2032 if( obj && obj->isKindOf( KINDOF_HERO ) )
2033 {
2034 *hero = TRUE;
2035 }
2036}
2037
2038//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2039Bool Object::isHero(void) const
2040{
2041 ContainModuleInterface *contain = getContain();
2042 if( contain )
2043 {
2044 Bool heroInside = FALSE;
2045 contain->iterateContained( localIsHero, (void*)(&heroInside), FALSE );
2046 if( heroInside )
2047 {
2048 return TRUE;
2049 }
2050 }
2051 return isKindOf( KINDOF_HERO );
2052}
2053
2054//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2055void Object::setReceivingDifficultyBonus(Bool receive)
2056{
2057 if (receive == m_isReceivingDifficultyBonus) {
2058 return;
2059 }
2060
2061 m_isReceivingDifficultyBonus = receive;
2062 getControllingPlayer()->friend_applyDifficultyBonusesForObject(this, m_isReceivingDifficultyBonus);
2063}
2064
2065//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2066//- DISABLEDNESS STUFF ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2067//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2068void Object::setDisabled( DisabledType type )
2069{
2070 setDisabledUntil(type, FOREVER);
2071}
2072
2073//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2074void Object::setDisabledUntil( DisabledType type, UnsignedInt frame )
2075{
2076 Bool edgeCase = !isDisabled();
2077
2078 if( type < 0 || type >= DISABLED_COUNT )
2079 {
2080 DEBUG_CRASH( ("Invalid disabled type value %d specified -- doesn't not exist!", type ) );
2081 return;
2082 }
2083
2084 //Handle audio events!
2085 AudioEventRTS sound;
2086 if( type == DISABLED_UNMANNED && !isKindOf( KINDOF_DRONE ) )
2087 {
2088 //We've been sniped! Play a splatter sound for the pilot losing his face.
2089 sound = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_splatterVehiclePilotsBrain;
2090 sound.setPosition( getPosition() );
2091 TheAudio->addAudioEvent( &sound );
2092 }
2093 else if( type == DISABLED_UNDERPOWERED || type == DISABLED_EMP || type == DISABLED_SUBDUED || type == DISABLED_HACKED )
2094 {
2095 //We've lost power -- make sure we aren't already out of power as the sounds shouldn't happen
2096 //if you were already disabled.
2097 if( !isDisabledByType( DISABLED_UNDERPOWERED ) &&
2098 !isDisabledByType( DISABLED_EMP ) &&
2099 !isDisabledByType( DISABLED_SUBDUED ) &&
2100 !isDisabledByType( DISABLED_HACKED ) )
2101 {
2102 if( isKindOf( KINDOF_STRUCTURE ) )
2103 {
2104 sound = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_buildingDisabled;
2105 sound.setPosition( getPosition() );
2106 TheAudio->addAudioEvent( &sound );
2107 }
2108 else if( isKindOf( KINDOF_VEHICLE ) )
2109 {
2110 sound = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_vehicleDisabled;
2111 sound.setPosition( getPosition() );
2112 TheAudio->addAudioEvent( &sound );
2113 }
2114 }
2115 }
2116
2117 if( m_disabledTillFrame[ type ] != frame )
2118 {
2119 // an edge-test for disabledness, for type. This INCREMENTS m_pauseCount
2120 // srj sez: HELD nevers disables special powers.
2121 if ( type != DISABLED_HELD && !isDisabledByType( type ) )
2122 pauseAllSpecialPowers( TRUE );
2123
2124 m_disabledTillFrame[ type ] = frame;
2125 m_disabledMask.set( type, frame > TheGameLogic->getFrame() );
2126
2127 if( m_drawable )
2128 {
2129 if( isDisabled() )
2130 {
2131 // Held does not tint anybody. If we are multiply disabled, the other setting will hit the tint,
2132 // and in clear, only-held and not-disabled are both causes to untint.
2133 // Doh. Also shouldn't be tinting when disabled by scripting.
2134 // Doh^2. Also shouldn't be CLEARING tinting if we're disabling by held or script disabledness
2135 // Doh^3. Unmanned is no tint too
2136 if( type != DISABLED_HELD && type != DISABLED_SCRIPT_DISABLED && type != DISABLED_UNMANNED )
2137 {
2138 m_drawable->setTintStatus( TINT_STATUS_DISABLED );
2139 }
2140 }
2141 }
2142
2143 ContainModuleInterface *contain = getContain();
2144 if ( contain )
2145 {
2146 Object *rider = (Object*)contain->friend_getRider();
2147 if ( rider )
2148 {
2149 rider->setDisabledUntil(type, frame);
2150 }
2151 }
2152
2153 if ( isKindOf( KINDOF_SPAWNS_ARE_THE_WEAPONS ) )
2154 {
2155 SpawnBehaviorInterface *sbi = this->getSpawnBehaviorInterface();
2156 if ( sbi )
2157 {
2158 //Kris: Patch 1.01 - November 12, 2003
2159 //Actually, we want to disable the slaves, not order them to go idle! This fix was made to
2160 //stinger sites getting hit by an EMP to prevent the soldiers from attacking.
2161 //sbi->orderSlavesToGoIdle( CMD_FROM_AI ); // the canattack() will take care of any future attempts to fire
2162 sbi->orderSlavesDisabledUntil( type, frame );
2163 }
2164
2165 }
2166
2167 }
2168
2169 if( type == DISABLED_UNMANNED && !isKindOf( KINDOF_DRONE ) )
2170 {
2171 //strange but true: If I am a carbomb,
2172 //my driver actually has a dead-man's
2173 //trigger for my dynamite...
2174 //If he gets sniped, I blow up! Wheeee!
2175
2176 WeaponSetFlags flags;
2177 flags.set( WEAPONSET_CARBOMB );
2178 const WeaponTemplateSet* set = getTemplate()->findWeaponTemplateSet( flags );
2179 if( set && set->testWeaponSetFlag( WEAPONSET_CARBOMB ) )
2180 {
2181 Object* sniper = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID( getBodyModule()->getLastDamageInfo()->in.m_sourceID );
2182 if ( sniper )
2183 sniper->scoreTheKill( this );
2184
2185 kill();
2186 }
2187 else
2188 {
2189 //This vehicle's pilot has been sniped, so we want to clear the veterancy rating (if any)
2190 ExperienceTracker *xpTracker = getExperienceTracker();
2191 if( xpTracker )
2192 {
2193 xpTracker->setExperienceAndLevel( 0, FALSE );
2194 }
2195 //Not only that, but it also loses any healing bonuses it may have earned in its prior life
2196 {
2197 static const NameKeyType key_AutoHealBehavior = NAMEKEY("AutoHealBehavior");
2198 AutoHealBehavior* autoHeal = (AutoHealBehavior*)(findUpdateModule( key_AutoHealBehavior ));
2199 if (autoHeal)
2200 autoHeal->undoUpgrade();
2201
2202
2203 }
2204 }
2205
2206 }
2207
2208 // This will only be called if we were NOT disabled before coming into this function.
2209 if (edgeCase) {
2210 onDisabledEdge(true);
2211 }
2212}
2213
2214//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2215UnsignedInt Object::getDisabledUntil( DisabledType type ) const
2216{
2217 if( type == DISABLED_ANY )
2218 {
2219 UnsignedInt highestFrame = 0;
2220 //Iterate through each disabled type and return the one with the highest frame.
2221 for( Int i = 0; i < DISABLED_COUNT; i++ )
2222 {
2223 if( m_disabledMask.test( i ) && m_disabledTillFrame[ i ] > highestFrame )
2224 {
2225 highestFrame = m_disabledTillFrame[ i ];
2226 }
2227 }
2228 return highestFrame;
2229 }
2230 else if( m_disabledMask.test( type ) )
2231 {
2232 //Specific query.
2233 return m_disabledTillFrame[ type ];
2234 }
2235 //Not disabled.
2236 return 0;
2237}
2238
2239//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2240Bool Object::clearDisabled( DisabledType type )
2241{
2242 if( type < 0 || type >= DISABLED_COUNT )
2243 {
2244 DEBUG_CRASH( ("Invalid disabled type value %d specified -- doesn't not exist!", type ) );
2245 return FALSE;
2246 }
2247
2248 if (!isDisabledByType(type)) {
2249 return FALSE;
2250 }
2251
2252 if( type == DISABLED_UNDERPOWERED || type == DISABLED_EMP || type == DISABLED_SUBDUED || type == DISABLED_HACKED )
2253 {
2254 //We've regained power-- make sure we aren't still disabled by another type.
2255 AudioEventRTS sound;
2256 if( (!isDisabledByType( DISABLED_UNDERPOWERED ) || type == DISABLED_UNDERPOWERED ) &&
2257 (!isDisabledByType( DISABLED_EMP ) || type == DISABLED_EMP ) &&
2258 (!isDisabledByType( DISABLED_SUBDUED ) || type == DISABLED_SUBDUED ) &&
2259 (!isDisabledByType( DISABLED_HACKED ) || type == DISABLED_HACKED ) )
2260 {
2261 if( isKindOf( KINDOF_STRUCTURE ) )
2262 {
2263 sound = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_buildingReenabled;
2264 sound.setPosition( getPosition() );
2265 TheAudio->addAudioEvent( &sound );
2266 }
2267 else if( isKindOf( KINDOF_VEHICLE ) )
2268 {
2269 sound = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_vehicleReenabled;
2270 sound.setPosition( getPosition() );
2271 TheAudio->addAudioEvent( &sound );
2272 }
2273 }
2274 }
2275
2276
2277 // an edge-test for disabledness, for type. This DECREMENTS m_pauseCount
2278 // srj sez: HELD nevers disables special powers.
2279 if ( type != DISABLED_HELD && isDisabledByType( type ) )
2280 pauseAllSpecialPowers( FALSE );
2281
2282 ContainModuleInterface *contain = getContain();
2283 if ( contain )
2284 {
2285 // We explicitly pass stuff in up in the set, so we need to turn it off if it is a forever type
2286 Object *rider = (Object*)contain->friend_getRider();
2287 if( rider && (m_disabledTillFrame[ type ] == FOREVER) )
2288 {
2289 rider->clearDisabled(type);
2290 }
2291 }
2292
2293 if ( isKindOf( KINDOF_SPAWNS_ARE_THE_WEAPONS ) )
2294 {
2295 SpawnBehaviorInterface *sbi = this->getSpawnBehaviorInterface();
2296 if ( sbi )
2297 {
2298 //Kris: Patch 1.02 - December 17, 2003
2299 //Make sure slaves can recover from being disabled by subdual (stinger site soldier case)
2300 sbi->orderSlavesToClearDisabled( type );
2301 }
2302
2303 }
2304
2305 m_disabledTillFrame[ type ] = NEVER;
2306 m_disabledMask.set( type, 0 );
2307
2308 DisabledMaskType exceptions;
2309 exceptions.set(DISABLED_HELD);
2310 exceptions.set(DISABLED_SCRIPT_DISABLED);
2311 exceptions.set(DISABLED_UNMANNED);
2312
2313 DisabledMaskType myFlagsMinusExceptions = getDisabledFlags();
2314 myFlagsMinusExceptions.clearAndSet(exceptions, DISABLEDMASK_NONE);
2315
2316 // to clarify, if I am NOT disabled by anything other than DISABLED_HELD, or DISABLED_SCRIPT_DISABLED
2317
2318 // to clarify, count inverse intersection gives you the number of exceptions you don't have,
2319 // and has nothing to do with checking other disabled types
2320// if( !isDisabled() || getDisabledFlags().countInverseIntersection( exceptions ) == 0 )
2321 if( myFlagsMinusExceptions.count() == 0 )
2322 {
2323 // I have no disabled flag that is not one of the exceptions above.
2324 if (m_drawable)
2325 m_drawable->clearTintStatus( TINT_STATUS_DISABLED );
2326 }
2327
2328 checkDisabledStatus();// in case we just edged
2329
2330 // if we're no longer disabled by anything, then call the edge function.
2331 if (!isDisabled()) {
2332 onDisabledEdge(false);
2333 }
2334 return TRUE;
2335}
2336
2337
2338//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2339//Checks any timers and clears disabled statii that have expired.
2340//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2341void Object::checkDisabledStatus()
2342{
2343 UnsignedInt now = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
2344 for( int i = 0; i < DISABLED_COUNT; i++ )
2345 {
2346 DisabledType type = (DisabledType)i;
2347 if( isDisabledByType( type ) )
2348 {
2349 if ( now >= m_disabledTillFrame[ i ] )
2350 {
2351 clearDisabled( type ); // This will also DECREMENT m_pauseCount in all specialpowers
2352 m_disabledMask.set( type, 0 );
2353 }
2354 }
2355 }
2356}
2357
2358//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2359void Object::pauseAllSpecialPowers( const Bool disabling ) const
2360{
2361 for (BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m)
2362 {
2363 SpecialPowerModuleInterface* sp = (*m)->getSpecialPower();
2364 if (!sp)
2365 continue;
2366
2367 sp->pauseCountdown( disabling );// So it will pause if we are disabling.
2368 }
2369}
2370
2371//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2372//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2374//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2375void Object::updateTriggerAreaFlags()
2376{
2377 Int j = 0;
2378 // Update the flags, and remove any trigger areas that this object isn't inside.
2379 for (Int i=0; i<m_numTriggerAreasActive; i++)
2380 {
2381 if (!m_triggerInfo[j].isInside)
2382 continue;
2383 m_triggerInfo[j].entered = false;
2384 m_triggerInfo[j].exited = false;
2385 m_triggerInfo[j].isInside = m_triggerInfo[i].isInside;
2386 m_triggerInfo[j].pTrigger = m_triggerInfo[i].pTrigger;
2387 j++;
2388 }
2389 m_numTriggerAreasActive = j;
2390}
2391
2392//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2393void Object::onCollide( Object *other, const Coord3D *loc, const Coord3D *normal )
2394{
2395 for (BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m)
2396 {
2397 CollideModuleInterface* collide = (*m)->getCollide();
2398 if (!collide)
2399 continue;
2400
2401 // check each time thru the loop, in case a collide module sets it
2402 if( getStatusBits().test( OBJECT_STATUS_NO_COLLISIONS ) )
2403 {
2404#ifdef DEBUG_CRC
2405 //DEBUG_LOG(("Object::onCollide() - OBJECT_STATUS_NO_COLLISIONS set\n"));
2406#endif
2407 break;
2408 }
2409#ifdef DEBUG_CRC
2410 //DEBUG_LOG(("Object::onCollide() - calling collide module\n"));
2411#endif
2412 collide->onCollide(other, loc, normal);
2413 }
2414}
2415
2416//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2417Bool Object::isSalvageCrate() const
2418{
2419 for( BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m )
2420 {
2421 CollideModuleInterface* collide = (*m)->getCollide();
