4860//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4861void Object::removeValue()
4862{
4863 if( m_partitionLastValue->isInvalid() )
4864 {
4865 // removing before adding is valid, cause we always remove before adding. (So the first remove
4866 // will occur before the first add)
4867 return;
4868 }
4869
4870 ThePartitionManager->undoValueAffect(m_partitionLastValue->m_where.x,
4871 m_partitionLastValue->m_where.y,
4872 m_partitionLastValue->m_howFar,
4873 m_partitionLastValue->m_data,
4874 m_partitionLastValue->m_forWhom
4875 );
4876
4877 m_partitionLastValue->reset();
4878}
4879
4880//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4881void Object::addThreat()
4882{
4883 if( !m_partitionLastThreat->isInvalid() )
4884 {
4885 DEBUG_CRASH( ("An Object is adding threat, but hasn't removed his previous threat. (He hasn't finished the threat?)") );
4886 return;
4887 }
4888
4889 if (!getControllingPlayer())
4890 return;
4891
4892 if( getStatusBits().test( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) || isEffectivelyDead() || getShroudClearingRange() <= 0.0f )
4893 return;
4894
4895
4896 m_partitionLastThreat->m_where = *getPosition();
4897 m_partitionLastThreat->m_data = getTemplate()->getThreatValue();
4898
4899 m_partitionLastThreat->m_forWhom = getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerMask();
4900 m_partitionLastThreat->m_howFar = getVisionRange(); // we are threatening all the way to where we can target.
4901
4902 ThePartitionManager->doThreatAffect(m_partitionLastThreat->m_where.x,
4903 m_partitionLastThreat->m_where.y,
4904 m_partitionLastThreat->m_howFar,
4905 m_partitionLastThreat->m_data,
4906 m_partitionLastThreat->m_forWhom
4907 );
4908}
4909
4910//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4911void Object::removeThreat()
4912{
4913 if( m_partitionLastThreat->isInvalid() )
4914 {
4915 // removing before adding is valid, cause we always remove before adding. (So the first remove
4916 // will occur before the first add)
4917 return;
4918 }
4919
4920 ThePartitionManager->undoThreatAffect(m_partitionLastThreat->m_where.x,
4921 m_partitionLastThreat->m_where.y,
4922 m_partitionLastThreat->m_howFar,
4923 m_partitionLastThreat->m_data,
4924 m_partitionLastThreat->m_forWhom
4925 );
4926
4927 m_partitionLastThreat->reset();
4928}
4929
4930
4931
4932//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4933void Object::look()
4934{
4935 if( ! m_partitionLastLook->isInvalid() )
4936 {
4937 DEBUG_CRASH( ("An Object is looking, but hasn't unlooked the last one.") );
4938 return;
4939 }
4940
4941 Player* controller = getControllingPlayer();
4942 if ( controller )
4943 {
4944 // I removed the check for objects under construction by request of designers since
4945 // they want constructing objects to have a reduced sight range now. -MW
4946 // dead or blind things don't reveal shroud
4947
4948
4949
4950 // Some things get Destroyed directly without hitting Death.
4951 if( !isDestroyed() && !isEffectivelyDead() )
4952 {
4953
4954 ContainModuleInterface * contain = (getContainedBy() ? getContainedBy()->getContain() : NULL);
4955 if ( contain && !contain->isGarrisonable() )
4956 return;// dont look, 'cause you are in a tunnel, now
4957 // GS 10-20 Need to expand that exception to all transports or else you get a perma reveal where
4958 // you entered the transport. Remember, this hackiness is caused by the fact that we never realized that
4959 // garrisoned buildings weren't looking, we were just seeing the leftover last look of the guy inside.
4960 // Otherwise we'd just have enclosingContainer control looking which is the 'correct' answer.
4961
4962 Real shroudClearingRange = getShroudClearingRange();
4963 if( shroudClearingRange > 0.0f )
4964 {
4965 PlayerMaskType lookingMask = 0;
4966
4967 if ( isKindOf(KINDOF_REVEAL_TO_ALL) )
4968 {
4969 lookingMask = PLAYERMASK_ALL;
4970 }
4971 else
4972 {
4973 for( Int currentIndex = ThePlayerList->getPlayerCount() - 1; currentIndex >=0; currentIndex-- )
4974 {
4975 const Player *currentPlayer = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer( currentIndex );
4976
4977 // Build mask of of allies who can see me.
4978 // This is the Object-centric game level that cares
4979 if( getControllingPlayer()->getRelationship( currentPlayer->getDefaultTeam() ) == ALLIES )
4980 {
4981 lookingMask |= currentPlayer->getPlayerMask();
4982 }
4983 }
4984
4985 // Other players can also be looking through our eyes.
4986 lookingMask |= m_visionSpiedMask;
4987 }
4988
4989 Coord3D pos = *getPosition();
4990 ThePartitionManager->doShroudReveal( pos.x, pos.y, shroudClearingRange, lookingMask );
4991
4992 m_partitionLastLook->m_where = pos;
4993 m_partitionLastLook->m_forWhom = lookingMask;
4994 m_partitionLastLook->m_howFar = getShroudClearingRange();
4995
4996 // DEBUG_LOG(( "A %s looks at %f, %f for %x at range %f\n",
4997 // getTemplate()->getName().str(),
4998 // pos.x,
4999 // pos.y,
5000 // lookingMask,
5001 // getShroudClearingRange()
5002 // ));
5003 }
5004
5005 //Now reveal to everyone if we're special. Note this works differently than KINDOF_REVEAL_TO_ALL because
5006 //the kindof uses the same range as allies, spies, and owners would see. This template based shroud
5007 //reveal to all range can specify a different value so we can get a much smaller reveal distance.
5008 // And don't reveal while under construction. When finished, a refresh occurs, so don't worry.
5009 Real shroudRevealToAllRange = getTemplate()->getShroudRevealToAllRange();
5010 if( shroudRevealToAllRange > 0.0f && !testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) )
5011 {
5012 //Kris: August 20, 2003
5013 //Seeing I added this concept, I'm changing it now to only reveal to all when the unit is visible. If it's stealthed,
5014 //we won't reveal it anymore (stealth general scudstorm).
5015 Bool stealthedAndNotDetected = testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_STEALTHED ) && !testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_DETECTED ) && !testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_DISGUISED );
5016 if( !stealthedAndNotDetected )
5017 {
5018 Coord3D pos = *getPosition();
5019 PlayerMaskType thePlayersMask = ThePlayerList->getPlayersWithRelationship( getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerIndex(), ALLOW_ENEMIES | ALLOW_NEUTRAL );
5020 ThePartitionManager->doShroudReveal( pos.x, pos.y, shroudRevealToAllRange, thePlayersMask );
5021 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->m_where = pos;
5022 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->m_forWhom = thePlayersMask;
5023 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->m_howFar = shroudRevealToAllRange;
5024 }
5025 }
5026 }
5027 }
5028}
5029
5030//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5031void Object::unlook()
5032{
5033 if( m_partitionLastLook->isInvalid() )
5034 {
5035 // Your very first action will be an unlook, so of course you haven't looked yet. This is not an error
5036 // This early return prevents an extra unlook if you never looked. Like you have 0 vision.
5037 return;
5038 }
5039
5040 ThePartitionManager->queueUndoShroudReveal(m_partitionLastLook->m_where.x,
5041 m_partitionLastLook->m_where.y,
5042 m_partitionLastLook->m_howFar,
5043 m_partitionLastLook->m_forWhom
5044 );
5045
5046// DEBUG_LOG(( "A %s queues an unlook at %f, %f for %x at range %f\n",
5047// getTemplate()->getName().str(),
5048// m_partitionLastLook.m_where.x,
5049// m_partitionLastLook.m_where.y,
5050// m_partitionLastLook.m_forWhom,
5051// m_partitionLastLook.m_howFar
5052// ));
5053
5054 m_partitionLastLook->reset();
5055
5056 if( !m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->isInvalid() )
5057 {
5058 ThePartitionManager->queueUndoShroudReveal(m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->m_where.x,
5059 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->m_where.y,
5060 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->m_howFar,
5061 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->m_forWhom
5062 );
5063
5064 m_partitionRevealAllLastLook->reset();
5065 }
5066}
5067
5068//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5069void Object::shroud()
5070{
5071 if( ! m_partitionLastShroud->isInvalid() )
5072 {
5073 DEBUG_CRASH( ("An Object is shrouding, but hasn't unshrouded the last one.") );
5074 return;
5075 }
5076
5077 Player* controller = getControllingPlayer();
5078 if ( controller )
5079 {
5080 // things under construction don't shroud. (srj), nor do dead or blind things
5081 if( !getStatusBits().test( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) && !isEffectivelyDead() && getShroudRange() > 0.0f )
5082 {
5083 PlayerMaskType shroudingMask = 0;
5084 for( Int currentIndex = ThePlayerList->getPlayerCount() - 1; currentIndex >=0; currentIndex-- )
5085 {
5086 const Player *currentPlayer = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer( currentIndex );
5087 //Build mask of NON-allies. This is the Object-centric game level that cares
5088 if( getControllingPlayer()->getRelationship( currentPlayer->getDefaultTeam() ) != ALLIES )
5089 {
5090 shroudingMask |= currentPlayer->getPlayerMask();
5091 }
5092 }
5093
5094 Coord3D pos = *getPosition();
5095 ThePartitionManager->doShroudCover(pos.x, pos.y,
5096 getShroudRange(),
5097 shroudingMask);
5098
5099 m_partitionLastShroud->m_where = pos;
5100 m_partitionLastShroud->m_forWhom = shroudingMask;
5101 m_partitionLastShroud->m_howFar = getShroudRange();
5102 }
5103 }
5104}
5105
5106//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5107void Object::unshroud()
5108{
5109 if( m_partitionLastShroud->isInvalid() )
5110 {
5111 // Your very first action will be an unlook, so of course you haven't looked yet. This is not an error
5112 // This early return prevents an extra unlook if you never looked. Like you have 0 shroud generation.
5113 return;
5114 }
5115
5116 ThePartitionManager->undoShroudCover(m_partitionLastShroud->m_where.x,
5117 m_partitionLastShroud->m_where.y,
5118 m_partitionLastShroud->m_howFar,
5119 m_partitionLastShroud->m_forWhom);
5120
5121 m_partitionLastShroud->reset();
5122}
5123
5124//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5125Real Object::getVisionRange() const
5126{
5127#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
5128 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibility)
5129 {
5130 Vector3 pos(m_visionRange, 0, 0);
5131 for (int i = 0; i < TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileCount; ++i)
5132 {
5133 pos.Rotate_Z(1.0f * i / TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileCount * 2 * PI);
5134 Coord3D coord = { pos.X + getPosition()->x, pos.Y + getPosition()->y, pos.Z + getPosition()->z };
5135
5136 addIcon(&coord, TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileWidth,
5137 TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileDuration,
5138 TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTargettableColor);
5139 }
5140 }
5141#endif
5142 return m_visionRange;
5143}
5144
5145//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5146void Object::setVisionRange( Real newVisionRange )
5147{
5148 m_visionRange = newVisionRange;
5149}
5150
5151//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5152Real Object::getShroudClearingRange() const
5153{
5154 Real shroudClearingRange=m_shroudClearingRange;
5155
5156 if( getStatusBits().test( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) )
5157 {
5158 //structures under construction have limited vision range. For now, base it
5159 //on the geometry extents so the structure can only see itself.
5160 shroudClearingRange = getGeometryInfo().getBoundingCircleRadius();
5161 }
5162
5163#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
5164 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibility)
5165 {
5166 Vector3 pos(shroudClearingRange, 0, 0);
5167 for (int i = 0; i < TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileCount; ++i)
5168 {
5169 pos.Rotate_Z(1.0f * i / TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileCount * 2 * PI);
5170 Coord3D coord = { pos.X + getPosition()->x, pos.Y + getPosition()->y, pos.Z + getPosition()->z };
5171
5172 addIcon(&coord, TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileWidth,
5173 TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileDuration,
5174 TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityDeshroudColor);
5175 }
5176 }
5177#endif
5178
5179 return shroudClearingRange;
5180}
5181
5182//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5183void Object::setShroudClearingRange( Real newShroudClearingRange )
5184{
5185 if( newShroudClearingRange != m_shroudClearingRange )
5186 {
5187 // The partition cell refresh is a slow operation, so only do it if you really have to.
5188 // Range change is a valid reason to relook.
5189 m_shroudClearingRange = newShroudClearingRange;
5190
5191 /*
5192 Complete and total monkey hack fix.
5193
5194 The problem: newObject doesn't get an initial pos, so all objects start at 0,0,0.
5195 Most code paths instantly move 'em to a good pos, but in some cases, that is too late:
5196 If we have search-and-destroy battle plan, we will apply it at that point, and clear out
5197 a vision range based on our current (wrong) location. Doh!
5198
5199 So, this just sez: if you are at 0,0,0, don't call handlePartitionCellMaintenance()... since
5200 you will either (1) be moved elsewhere immediately, thus forcing it to be called via
5201 another route anyway, or (2) not be moved, which means you are a very naughty and worthless
5202 object anyway and we should just ignore you.
5203
5204 Proper fix for next version is to require initial pos to be passed in to newObject so that
5205 all objects can start at their proper initial position from the start of the ctor.
5206
5207 (srj)
5208 */
5209 const Coord3D* pos = getPosition();
5210 if (pos->x || pos->y || pos->z)
5211 {
5212 handlePartitionCellMaintenance();
5213 }
5214 }
5215}
5216
5217//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5218Real Object::getShroudRange() const
5219{
5220#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
5221 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibility)
5222 {
5223 Vector3 pos(m_shroudRange, 0, 0);
5224 for (int i = 0; i < TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileCount; ++i)
5225 {
5226 pos.Rotate_Z(1.0f * i / TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileCount * 2 * PI);
5227 Coord3D coord = { pos.X + getPosition()->x, pos.Y + getPosition()->y, pos.Z + getPosition()->z };
5228
5229 addIcon(&coord, TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileWidth,
5230 TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityTileDuration,
5231 TheGlobalData->m_debugVisibilityGapColor);
5232 }
5233 }
5234#endif
5235
5236 return m_shroudRange;
5237}
5238
5239//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5240void Object::setShroudRange( Real newShroudRange )
5241{
5242 m_shroudRange = newShroudRange;
5243}
5244
5245//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5246void Object::setVisionSpied(Bool setting, Int byWhom)
5247{
5248 Bool needRefresh = FALSE; // If this setting is an edge trigger on the reference count, I need to refresh
5249
5250 if( setting )
5251 {
5252 m_visionSpiedBy[ byWhom ] = m_visionSpiedBy[ byWhom ] + 1;
5253 if( m_visionSpiedBy[ byWhom ] == 1 )
5254 needRefresh = TRUE;
5255 }
5256 else
5257 {
5258 m_visionSpiedBy[ byWhom ] = m_visionSpiedBy[ byWhom ] - 1;
5259 if( m_visionSpiedBy[ byWhom ] == 0 )
5260 needRefresh = TRUE;
5261 }
5262
5263 if( needRefresh )
5264 {
5265 PlayerMaskType workingMask = 0;
5266 for (Int i = 0; i < MAX_PLAYER_COUNT; ++i)
5267 {
5268 if( m_visionSpiedBy[i] > 0 )
5269 BitSet( workingMask, ( 1 << i ) );
5270 else
5271 BitClear( workingMask, ( 1 << i ) );
5272 }
5273
5274 m_visionSpiedMask = workingMask;
5275
5276 handlePartitionCellMaintenance();
5277 }
5278}
5279
5280//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5281void Object::doStatusDamage( ObjectStatusTypes status, Real duration )
5282{
5283 if(m_statusDamageHelper)
5284 m_statusDamageHelper->doStatusDamage(status, duration);
5285}
5286
5287//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5288void Object::doTempWeaponBonus( WeaponBonusConditionType status, UnsignedInt duration )
5289{
5290 if(m_tempWeaponBonusHelper)
5291 m_tempWeaponBonusHelper->doTempWeaponBonus(status, duration);
5292}
5293
5294//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5295void Object::notifySubdualDamage( Real amount )
5296{
5297 if(m_subdualDamageHelper)
5298 m_subdualDamageHelper->notifySubdualDamage( amount );
5299
5300 // If we are gaining subdual damage, we are slowly tinting
5301 if( getDrawable() )
5302 {
5303 if( amount > 0 )
5304 getDrawable()->setTintStatus(TINT_STATUS_GAINING_SUBDUAL_DAMAGE);
5305 else
5306 getDrawable()->clearTintStatus(TINT_STATUS_GAINING_SUBDUAL_DAMAGE);
5307 }
5308}
5309
5310//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5313//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5314SpecialPowerModuleInterface *Object::getSpecialPowerModule( const SpecialPowerTemplate *specialPowerTemplate ) const
5315{
5316
5317 // sanity
5318 if( specialPowerTemplate == NULL )
5319 return NULL;
5320
5321 // search the modules for the one with the matching template
5322 for( BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m )
5323 {
5324 SpecialPowerModuleInterface* sp = (*m)->getSpecialPower();
5325 if (!sp)
5326 continue;
5327
5328 if( sp->isModuleForPower( specialPowerTemplate ) )
5329 return sp;
5330 }
5331
5332 return NULL;
5333
5334}
5335
5336//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5338//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5339void Object::doSpecialPower( const SpecialPowerTemplate *specialPowerTemplate, UnsignedInt commandOptions, Bool forced )
5340{
5341
5342 if (isDisabled())
5343 return;
5344
5345 // sanity
5346 if( !forced && TheSpecialPowerStore->canUseSpecialPower( this, specialPowerTemplate ) == FALSE )
5347 return;
5348
5349 // get the module and execute
5350 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = getSpecialPowerModule( specialPowerTemplate );
5351 if( mod )
5352 mod->doSpecialPower( commandOptions );
5353
5354}
5355
5356//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5358//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5359void Object::doSpecialPowerAtObject( const SpecialPowerTemplate *specialPowerTemplate, Object *obj, UnsignedInt commandOptions, Bool forced )
5360{
5361
5362 if (isDisabled())
5363 return;
5364
5365 // sanity
5366 if( !forced && TheSpecialPowerStore->canUseSpecialPower( this, specialPowerTemplate ) == FALSE )
5367 return;
5368
5369 // get the module and execute
5370 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = getSpecialPowerModule( specialPowerTemplate );
5371 if( mod )
5372 mod->doSpecialPowerAtObject( obj, commandOptions );
5373}
5374
5375//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5377//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5378void Object::doSpecialPowerAtLocation( const SpecialPowerTemplate *specialPowerTemplate,
5379 const Coord3D *loc, Real angle, UnsignedInt commandOptions, Bool forced )
5380{
5381
5382 if (isDisabled())
5383 return;
5384
5385 // sanity
5386 if( !forced && TheSpecialPowerStore->canUseSpecialPower( this, specialPowerTemplate ) == FALSE )
5387 return;
5388
5389 // get the module and execute
5390 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = getSpecialPowerModule( specialPowerTemplate );
5391 if( mod )
5392 mod->doSpecialPowerAtLocation( loc, angle, commandOptions );
5393
5394}
5395
5396//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5398//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5399void Object::doSpecialPowerUsingWaypoints( const SpecialPowerTemplate *specialPowerTemplate, const Waypoint *way, UnsignedInt commandOptions, Bool forced )
5400{
5401
5402 if (isDisabled())
5403 return;
5404
5405 // sanity
5406 if( !forced && TheSpecialPowerStore->canUseSpecialPower( this, specialPowerTemplate ) == FALSE )
5407 return;
5408
5409 // get the module and execute
5410 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = getSpecialPowerModule( specialPowerTemplate );
5411 if( mod )
5412 mod->doSpecialPowerUsingWaypoints( way, commandOptions );
5413
5414}
5415
5416//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5418//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5419void Object::doCommandButton( const CommandButton *commandButton, CommandSourceType cmdSource )
5420{
5421 if (isDisabled())
5422 return;
5423
5424 AIUpdateInterface *ai = getAIUpdateInterface();
5425 if( commandButton )
5426 {
5427 switch( commandButton->getCommandType() )
5428 {
5429 case GUI_COMMAND_SPECIAL_POWER:
5430 if( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate() )
5431 {
5432 CommandOption commandOptions = (CommandOption)(commandButton->getOptions() | COMMAND_FIRED_BY_SCRIPT);
5433 doSpecialPower( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate(), commandOptions, cmdSource == CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
5434 return;
5435 }
5436 break;
5437 case GUI_COMMAND_STOP:
5438 if( ai )
5439 {
5440 ai->aiIdle( cmdSource );
5441 return;
5442 }
5443 break;
5444
5445 case GUI_COMMAND_SWITCH_WEAPON:
5446 {
5447 WeaponSlotType weaponSlot = commandButton->getWeaponSlot();
5448 // GUI_COMMAND_SWITCH_WEAPON switches until un-switched, or switched to something else.
5449 setWeaponLock( weaponSlot, LOCKED_PERMANENTLY );
5450 return;
5451 }
5452
5453 case GUI_COMMAND_FIRE_WEAPON:
5454 if( ai )
5455 {
5456 if( !BitTest( commandButton->getOptions(), COMMAND_OPTION_NEED_OBJECT_TARGET ) && !BitTest( commandButton->getOptions(), NEED_TARGET_POS ) )
5457 {
5458 setWeaponLock( commandButton->getWeaponSlot(), LOCKED_TEMPORARILY );
5459 //LOCATION BASED FIRE WEAPON
5460 ai->aiAttackPosition( NULL, commandButton->getMaxShotsToFire(), cmdSource );
5461 }
5462 else
5463 {
5464 DEBUG_CRASH( ("WARNING: Script doCommandButton for button %s cannot fire weapon with NO POSITION. Skipping.", commandButton->getName().str()) );
5465 }
5466 return;
5467 }
5468 break;
5469
5470 case GUI_COMMAND_OBJECT_UPGRADE:
5471 case GUI_COMMAND_PLAYER_UPGRADE:
5472 {
5473 const UpgradeTemplate *upgradeT = commandButton->getUpgradeTemplate();
5474 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH( upgradeT, ("Undefined upgrade '%s' in player upgrade command\n", "UNKNOWN") );
5475 // sanity
5476 if( upgradeT == NULL )
5477 break;
5478 if( upgradeT->getUpgradeType() == UPGRADE_TYPE_OBJECT )
5479 {
5480 if( hasUpgrade( upgradeT ) || !affectedByUpgrade( upgradeT ) )
5481 break;
5482 }
5483 // producer must have a production update
5484 ProductionUpdateInterface *pu = getProductionUpdateInterface();
5485 if( pu == NULL )
5486 break;
5487 // queue the upgrade "research"
5488 pu->queueUpgrade( upgradeT );
5489 }
5490 return;
5491 case GUI_COMMAND_UNIT_BUILD:
5492 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT: {
5493 const ThingTemplate *tt = commandButton->getThingTemplate();
5494 ProductionUpdateInterface *pu = this->getProductionUpdateInterface();
5495 if (pu && tt) {
5496 pu->queueCreateUnit( tt, pu->requestUniqueUnitID());
5497 return;
5498 }
5499 break;
5500 }
5501 case GUI_COMMAND_HACK_INTERNET:{
5502 if( ai )
5503 {
5504 ai->aiHackInternet( cmdSource );
5505 return;
5506 }
5507 break;
5508 }
5509
5510 case GUI_COMMAND_SELL:
5511 TheBuildAssistant->sellObject( this );
5512 return;
5513
5514 //Feel free to implement object based command buttons.
5515 case GUI_COMMAND_COMBATDROP:
5516 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT_CANCEL:
5517 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UNIT_BUILD:
5518 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UPGRADE:
5519 case GUI_COMMAND_ATTACK_MOVE:
5520 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD:
5521 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_WITHOUT_PURSUIT:
5522 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_FLYING_UNITS_ONLY:
5523 case GUI_COMMAND_WAYPOINTS:
5524 case GUI_COMMAND_EXIT_CONTAINER:
5525 case GUI_COMMAND_EVACUATE:
5526 case GUI_COMMAND_EXECUTE_RAILED_TRANSPORT:
5527 case GUI_COMMAND_BEACON_DELETE:
5528 case GUI_COMMAND_SET_RALLY_POINT:
5529 case GUI_COMMAND_TOGGLE_OVERCHARGE:
5530#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
5531 case GUI_COMMAND_POW_RETURN_TO_PRISON:
5532#endif
5533 case GUICOMMANDMODE_HIJACK_VEHICLE:
5534 case GUICOMMANDMODE_CONVERT_TO_CARBOMB:
5535#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
5536 case GUICOMMANDMODE_PICK_UP_PRISONER:
5537#endif
5538 default:
5539 break;
5540 }
5541 DEBUG_CRASH( ("WARNING: Script doCommandButton for button %s not implemented. Doing nothing.", commandButton->getName().str()) );
5542 }
5543}
5544
5545//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5547//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5548void Object::doCommandButtonAtObject( const CommandButton *commandButton, Object *obj, CommandSourceType cmdSource )
5549{
5550 if (isDisabled())
5551 return;
5552
5553 AIUpdateInterface *ai = getAIUpdateInterface();
5554 if( commandButton )
5555 {
5556 switch( commandButton->getCommandType() )
5557 {
5558 case GUI_COMMAND_COMBATDROP:
5559 if( ai )
5560 {
5561 ai->aiCombatDrop( obj, *(obj->getPosition()), cmdSource );
5562 }
5563 return;
5564 case GUI_COMMAND_SPECIAL_POWER:
5565 {
5566 if( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate() )
5567 {
5568 CommandOption commandOptions = (CommandOption)(commandButton->getOptions() | COMMAND_FIRED_BY_SCRIPT);
5569 doSpecialPowerAtObject( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate(), obj, commandOptions, cmdSource == CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
5570 }
5571 return;
5572 }
5573
5574 case GUI_COMMAND_STOP:
5575 if( ai )
5576 {
5577 ai->aiIdle( cmdSource );
5578 }
5579 return;
5580
5581 case GUI_COMMAND_FIRE_WEAPON:
5582 if( ai )
5583 {
5584 if( BitTest( commandButton->getOptions(), COMMAND_OPTION_NEED_OBJECT_TARGET ) )
5585 {
5586 //OBJECT BASED FIRE WEAPON
5587 if( !obj )
5588 {
5589 break;
5590 }
5591
5592 if( !commandButton->isValidObjectTarget( this, obj ) )
5593 {
5594 break;
5595 }
5596
5597 setWeaponLock( commandButton->getWeaponSlot(), LOCKED_TEMPORARILY );
5598
5599 if( BitTest( commandButton->getOptions(), ATTACK_OBJECTS_POSITION ) )
5600 {
5601 //Actually, you know what.... we want to attack the object's location instead.
5602 ai->aiAttackPosition( obj->getPosition(), commandButton->getMaxShotsToFire(), cmdSource );
5603 }
5604 else
5605 {
5606 ai->aiAttackObject( obj, commandButton->getMaxShotsToFire(), cmdSource );
5607 }
5608 }
5609 else
5610 {
5611 DEBUG_CRASH( ("WARNING: Script doCommandButtonAtObject for button %s cannot fire weapon at AN OBJECT. Skipping.", commandButton->getName().str()) );
5612 }
5613 return;
5614 }
5615 break;
5616
5617 case GUICOMMANDMODE_HIJACK_VEHICLE:
5618 case GUICOMMANDMODE_CONVERT_TO_CARBOMB:
5619 case GUICOMMANDMODE_SABOTAGE_BUILDING:
5620 if( ai )
5621 {
5622 ai->aiEnter( obj, cmdSource );
5623 }
5624 return;
5625
5626 //Feel free to implement object based command buttons.
5627 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT:
5628 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT_CANCEL:
5629 case GUI_COMMAND_UNIT_BUILD:
5630 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UNIT_BUILD:
5631 case GUI_COMMAND_PLAYER_UPGRADE:
5632 case GUI_COMMAND_OBJECT_UPGRADE:
5633 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UPGRADE:
5634 case GUI_COMMAND_ATTACK_MOVE:
5635 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD:
5636 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_WITHOUT_PURSUIT:
5637 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_FLYING_UNITS_ONLY:
5638 case GUI_COMMAND_WAYPOINTS:
5639 case GUI_COMMAND_EXIT_CONTAINER:
5640 case GUI_COMMAND_EVACUATE:
5641 case GUI_COMMAND_EXECUTE_RAILED_TRANSPORT:
5642 case GUI_COMMAND_BEACON_DELETE:
5643 case GUI_COMMAND_SET_RALLY_POINT:
5644 case GUI_COMMAND_SELL:
5645 case GUI_COMMAND_HACK_INTERNET:
5646 case GUI_COMMAND_TOGGLE_OVERCHARGE:
5647 case GUI_COMMAND_SWITCH_WEAPON:
5648
5649#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
5650 case GUI_COMMAND_POW_RETURN_TO_PRISON:
5651 case GUICOMMANDMODE_PICK_UP_PRISONER:
5652#endif
5653 default:
5654 break;
5655 }
5656 DEBUG_CRASH( ("WARNING: Script doCommandButtonAtObject for button %s not implemented. Doing nothing.", commandButton->getName().str()) );
5657 }
5658}
5659
5660//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5662//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5663void Object::doCommandButtonAtPosition( const CommandButton *commandButton, const Coord3D *pos, CommandSourceType cmdSource )
5664{
5665 if (isDisabled())
5666 return;
5667
5668 AIUpdateInterface *ai = getAIUpdateInterface();
5669 if( commandButton )
5670 {
5671 switch( commandButton->getCommandType() )
5672 {
5673 case GUI_COMMAND_SPECIAL_POWER:
5674 {
5675 if( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate() )
5676 {
5677 CommandOption commandOptions = (CommandOption)(commandButton->getOptions() | COMMAND_FIRED_BY_SCRIPT);
5678 doSpecialPowerAtLocation( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate(), pos, INVALID_ANGLE, commandOptions, cmdSource == CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
5679 return;
5680 }
5681 break;
5682 }
5683 case GUI_COMMAND_ATTACK_MOVE:
5684 if( ai )
5685 {
5686 ai->aiAttackMoveToPosition( pos, commandButton->getMaxShotsToFire(), cmdSource );
5687 return;
5688 }
5689 break;
5690 case GUI_COMMAND_STOP:
5691 if( ai )
5692 {
5693 ai->aiIdle( cmdSource );
5694 return;
5695 }
5696 break;
5697
5698 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT:
5699 TheBuildAssistant->buildObjectNow( this, commandButton->getThingTemplate(), pos, 0.0f, getControllingPlayer() );
5700 return;
5701
5702 case GUI_COMMAND_FIRE_WEAPON:
5703 if( ai )
5704 {
5705 if( BitTest( commandButton->getOptions(), NEED_TARGET_POS ) )
5706 {
5707 //LOCATION BASED FIRE WEAPON
5708 if( !pos )
5709 {
5710 break;
5711 }
5712 setWeaponLock( commandButton->getWeaponSlot(), LOCKED_TEMPORARILY );
5713 ai->aiAttackPosition( pos, commandButton->getMaxShotsToFire(), cmdSource );
5714 }
5715 else
5716 {
5717 DEBUG_CRASH( ("WARNING: Script doCommandButtonAtPosition for button %s cannot fire weapon at A POSITION. Skipping.", commandButton->getName().str()) );
5718 }
5719 return;
5720 }
5721 break;
5722
5723 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT_CANCEL:
5724 case GUI_COMMAND_UNIT_BUILD:
5725 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UNIT_BUILD:
5726 case GUI_COMMAND_PLAYER_UPGRADE:
5727 case GUI_COMMAND_OBJECT_UPGRADE:
5728 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UPGRADE:
5729 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD:
5730 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_WITHOUT_PURSUIT:
5731 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_FLYING_UNITS_ONLY:
5732 case GUI_COMMAND_WAYPOINTS:
5733 case GUI_COMMAND_EXIT_CONTAINER:
5734 case GUI_COMMAND_EVACUATE:
5735 case GUI_COMMAND_EXECUTE_RAILED_TRANSPORT:
5736 case GUI_COMMAND_BEACON_DELETE:
5737 case GUI_COMMAND_SET_RALLY_POINT:
5738 case GUI_COMMAND_SELL:
5739 case GUI_COMMAND_HACK_INTERNET:
5740 case GUI_COMMAND_TOGGLE_OVERCHARGE:
5741#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
5742 case GUI_COMMAND_POW_RETURN_TO_PRISON:
5743#endif
5744 case GUI_COMMAND_COMBATDROP:
5745 case GUI_COMMAND_SWITCH_WEAPON:
5746 case GUICOMMANDMODE_HIJACK_VEHICLE:
5747 case GUICOMMANDMODE_CONVERT_TO_CARBOMB:
5748#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
5749 case GUICOMMANDMODE_PICK_UP_PRISONER:
5750#endif
5751 default:
5752 break;
5753 }
5754 DEBUG_CRASH( ("WARNING: Script doCommandButtonAtPosition for button %s not implemented. Doing nothing.", commandButton->getName().str()) );
5755 }
5756}
5757
5758//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5760//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5761void Object::doCommandButtonUsingWaypoints( const CommandButton *commandButton, const Waypoint *way, CommandSourceType cmdSource )
5762{
5763 if (isDisabled())
5764 return;
5765
5766 if( commandButton )
5767 {
5768 if( !BitTest( commandButton->getOptions(), CAN_USE_WAYPOINTS ) )
5769 {
5770 //Our button doesn't support waypoints.
5771 DEBUG_CRASH( ("WARNING: Script doCommandButtonUsingWaypoints for button %s lacks CAN_USE_WAYPOINTS option. Doing nothing.", commandButton->getName().str()) );
5772 return;
5773 }
5774 switch( commandButton->getCommandType() )
5775 {
5776 case GUI_COMMAND_SPECIAL_POWER:
5777 {
5778 if( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate() )
5779 {
5780 CommandOption commandOptions = (CommandOption)(commandButton->getOptions() | COMMAND_FIRED_BY_SCRIPT);
5781 doSpecialPowerUsingWaypoints( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate(), way, commandOptions, cmdSource == CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
5782 return;
5783 }
5784 break;
5785 }
5786 case GUI_COMMAND_ATTACK_MOVE:
5787 case GUI_COMMAND_STOP:
5788 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT:
5789 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT_CANCEL:
5790 case GUI_COMMAND_UNIT_BUILD:
5791 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UNIT_BUILD:
5792 case GUI_COMMAND_PLAYER_UPGRADE:
5793 case GUI_COMMAND_OBJECT_UPGRADE:
5794 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UPGRADE:
5795 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD:
5796 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_WITHOUT_PURSUIT:
5797 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_FLYING_UNITS_ONLY:
5798 case GUI_COMMAND_WAYPOINTS:
5799 case GUI_COMMAND_EXIT_CONTAINER:
5800 case GUI_COMMAND_EVACUATE:
5801 case GUI_COMMAND_EXECUTE_RAILED_TRANSPORT:
5802 case GUI_COMMAND_BEACON_DELETE:
5803 case GUI_COMMAND_SET_RALLY_POINT:
5804 case GUI_COMMAND_SELL:
5805 case GUI_COMMAND_FIRE_WEAPON:
5806 case GUI_COMMAND_HACK_INTERNET:
5807 case GUI_COMMAND_TOGGLE_OVERCHARGE:
5808#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
5809 case GUI_COMMAND_POW_RETURN_TO_PRISON:
5810#endif
5811 case GUI_COMMAND_COMBATDROP:
5812 case GUI_COMMAND_SWITCH_WEAPON:
5813 case GUICOMMANDMODE_HIJACK_VEHICLE:
5814 case GUICOMMANDMODE_CONVERT_TO_CARBOMB:
5815#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
5816 case GUICOMMANDMODE_PICK_UP_PRISONER:
5817#endif
5818 default:
5819 break;
5820 }
5821 DEBUG_CRASH( ("WARNING: Script doCommandButtonUsingWaypoints for button %s not implemented. Doing nothing.", commandButton->getName().str()) );
5822 }
5823}
5824
5825// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5826// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5827void Object::clearLeechRangeModeForAllWeapons()
5828{
5829 m_weaponSet.clearLeechRangeModeForAllWeapons();
5830}
5831
5832// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5834// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5835ProductionUpdateInterface* Object::getProductionUpdateInterface( void )
5836{
5837 ProductionUpdateInterface *pui;
5838
5839 // tell our update modules that we intend to do this special power.
5840 for( BehaviorModule** u = m_behaviors; *u; ++u )
5841 {
5842
5843 pui = (*u)->getProductionUpdateInterface();
5844 if( pui )
5845 return pui;
5846
5847 } // end for
5848
5849 return NULL;
5850
5851} // end getProductionUpdateInterface
5852
5853// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5854// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5855DockUpdateInterface *Object::getDockUpdateInterface( void )
5856{
5857 DockUpdateInterface *dock = NULL;
5858
5859 for( BehaviorModule **u = m_behaviors; *u; ++u )
5860 {
5861 if( (dock = (*u)->getDockUpdateInterface()) != NULL )
5862 return dock;
5863 }
5864
5865 return NULL;
5866
5867} // end getDockUpdateInterface
5868
5869// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5870// Search our special power modules for a specific one.
5871// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5872SpecialPowerModuleInterface* Object::findSpecialPowerModuleInterface( SpecialPowerType type ) const
5873{
5874 for (BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m)
5875 {
5876 SpecialPowerModuleInterface* sp = (*m)->getSpecialPower();
5877 if (!sp)
5878 continue;
5879
5880 const SpecialPowerTemplate *spTemplate = sp->getSpecialPowerTemplate();
5881 if (spTemplate && spTemplate->getSpecialPowerType() == type || type == SPECIAL_INVALID )
5882 {
5883 return sp;
5884 }
5885 }
5886 return NULL;
5887}
5888
5889// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5890// Search our special power modules for the first occurrence of a shortcut special.
5891// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5892SpecialPowerModuleInterface* Object::findAnyShortcutSpecialPowerModuleInterface() const
5893{
5894 for( BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m )
5895 {
5896 SpecialPowerModuleInterface* sp = (*m)->getSpecialPower();
5897 if (!sp)
5898 continue;
5899
5900 const SpecialPowerTemplate *spTemplate = sp->getSpecialPowerTemplate();
5901 if( spTemplate && spTemplate->isShortcutPower() )
5902 {
5903 return sp;
5904 }
5905 }
5906 return NULL;
5907}
5908
5909// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5911// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5912SpawnBehaviorInterface* Object::getSpawnBehaviorInterface() const
5913{
5914 for (BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m)
5915 {
5916 SpawnBehaviorInterface *sbi = (*m)->getSpawnBehaviorInterface();
5917 if( sbi )
5918 {
5919 return sbi;
5920 }
5921 }
5922 return NULL;
5923} // end getSpawnBehaviorInterfaceFromObject
5924
5925// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5926ProjectileUpdateInterface* Object::getProjectileUpdateInterface() const
5927{
5928 for (BehaviorModule** m = m_behaviors; *m; ++m)
5929 {
5930 ProjectileUpdateInterface *pui = (*m)->getProjectileUpdateInterface();
5931 if( pui )
5932 {
5933 return pui;
5934 }
5935 }
5936 return NULL;
5937}
5938
5939// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5940// Simply find the special power module that is currently allowing plotting of positions to target.
5941// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5942SpecialPowerUpdateInterface* Object::findSpecialPowerWithOverridableDestinationActive( SpecialPowerType type ) const
5943{
5944 for( BehaviorModule** u = m_behaviors; *u; ++u )
5945 {
5946 SpecialPowerUpdateInterface *spInterface = (*u)->getSpecialPowerUpdateInterface();
5947 if( spInterface )
5948 {
5949 if( spInterface->doesSpecialPowerHaveOverridableDestinationActive() )
5950 {
5951 return spInterface;
5952 }
5953 }
5954 } // end for
5955 return NULL;
5956}
5957
5958// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5959// Simply find the special power module that is potentially allowed to plot positions to target.
5960// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5961SpecialPowerUpdateInterface* Object::findSpecialPowerWithOverridableDestination( SpecialPowerType type ) const
5962{
5963 for( BehaviorModule** u = m_behaviors; *u; ++u )
5964 {
5965 SpecialPowerUpdateInterface *spInterface = (*u)->getSpecialPowerUpdateInterface();
5966 if( spInterface )
5967 {
5968 if( spInterface->doesSpecialPowerHaveOverridableDestination() )
5969 {
5970 return spInterface;
5971 }
5972 }
5973 } // end for
5974 return NULL;
5975}
5976
5977
5978// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5979// Search our special ability updates for a specific one.
5980// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5981SpecialAbilityUpdate* Object::findSpecialAbilityUpdate( SpecialPowerType type ) const
5982{
5983 for( BehaviorModule** u = m_behaviors; *u; ++u )
5984 {
5985 SpecialPowerUpdateInterface *spInterface = (*u)->getSpecialPowerUpdateInterface();
5986 if( spInterface && spInterface->isSpecialAbility() )
5987 {
5988 SpecialAbilityUpdate *spUpdate = (SpecialAbilityUpdate*)spInterface;
5989 if( spUpdate->getSpecialPowerType() == type )
5990 {
5991 return spUpdate;
5992 }
5993 }
5994 } // end for
5995
5996 return NULL;
5997}
5998
5999// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6000SpecialPowerCompletionDie* Object::findSpecialPowerCompletionDie() const
6001{
6002 static NameKeyType key_SpecialPowerCompletionDie = NAMEKEY("SpecialPowerCompletionDie");
6003 return (SpecialPowerCompletionDie*)findModule(key_SpecialPowerCompletionDie);
6004}

6006// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6007Int Object::getNumConsecutiveShotsFiredAtTarget( const Object *victim ) const
6008{
6009 return m_firingTracker ? m_firingTracker->getNumConsecutiveShotsAtVictim( victim ) : 0;
6010}
6011
6012// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6013// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6014Bool Object::getSingleLogicalBonePosition(const char* boneName, Coord3D* position, Matrix3D* transform) const
6015{
6016 if (m_drawable && m_drawable->getPristineBonePositions( boneName, 0, position, transform, 1 ) == 1 )
6017 {
6018 m_drawable->convertBonePosToWorldPos( position, transform, position, transform );
6019 return true;
6020 }
6021 else
6022 {
6023 if (position)
6024 *position = *getPosition();
6025 if (transform)
6026 *transform = *getTransformMatrix();
6027 return false;
6028 }
6029}
6030
6031// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6032// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6033Bool Object::getSingleLogicalBonePositionOnTurret( WhichTurretType whichTurret, const char* boneName, Coord3D* position, Matrix3D* transform ) const
6034{
6035 Coord3D turretPosition;
6036 Coord3D bonePosition;
6037 if( getDrawable() == NULL || getAI() == NULL )
6038 return FALSE;
6039
6040 // We need to find the TurretBone's pristine position.
6041 getDrawable()->getProjectileLaunchOffset( PRIMARY_WEAPON, 1, NULL, whichTurret, &turretPosition, NULL );
6042 // And the required bone's pristine position
6043 if( getDrawable()->getPristineBonePositions(boneName, 0, &bonePosition, NULL, 1) != 1 )
6044 return FALSE;
6045 //Then we mojo the Logic position of the required bone like Missile firing does. Using the logic twist of the turret
6046 Real turretRotation;
6047 getAI()->getTurretRotAndPitch( whichTurret, &turretRotation, NULL );
6048
6049 Matrix3D boneOffset(TRUE);// This will be from the turret to the requested bone
6050
6051// Vector3 bonePositionVector( bonePosition.x - turretPosition.x,
6052// bonePosition.y - turretPosition.y,
6053// bonePosition.z - turretPosition.z );
6054 Vector3 bonePositionVector( bonePosition.x,
6055 bonePosition.y,
6056 bonePosition.z );
6057 boneOffset.Translate(bonePositionVector);
6058
6059 Matrix3D turnAdjustment(TRUE);// this is the turret twist to be applied to the final answer
6060
6061 turnAdjustment.Translate( turretPosition.x, turretPosition.y, turretPosition.z );
6062 turnAdjustment.In_Place_Pre_Rotate_Z(turretRotation);
6063 turnAdjustment.Translate( -turretPosition.x, -turretPosition.y, -turretPosition.z );
6064
6065 Matrix3D boneLogicTransform;
6066 boneLogicTransform.mul( turnAdjustment, boneOffset );
6067
6068 Matrix3D worldTransform;
6069 convertBonePosToWorldPos(NULL, &boneLogicTransform, NULL, &worldTransform);
6070
6071 Vector3 tmp = worldTransform.Get_Translation();
6072 Coord3D worldPos;
6073 worldPos.x = tmp.X;
6074 worldPos.y = tmp.Y;
6075 worldPos.z = tmp.Z;
6076
6077 if( position )
6078 *position = worldPos;
6079 if( transform )
6080 *transform = worldTransform;
6081
6082 return TRUE;
6083}
6084
6085// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6086// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6087Int Object::getMultiLogicalBonePosition(const char* boneNamePrefix, Int maxBones,
6088 Coord3D* positions, Matrix3D* transforms,
6089 Bool convertToWorld ) const
6090{
6091 Int count;
6092 if (m_drawable && (count = m_drawable->getPristineBonePositions( boneNamePrefix, 1, positions, transforms, maxBones )) > 0 )
6093 {
6094 if( convertToWorld )
6095 {
6096 for (Int i = 0; i < count; ++i)
6097 m_drawable->convertBonePosToWorldPos( positions ? &positions[i] : NULL, transforms ? &transforms[i] : NULL, positions ? &positions[i] : NULL, transforms ? &transforms[i] : NULL );
6098 }
6099 return count;
6100 }
6101 else
6102 {
6103 return 0;
6104 }
6105}
6106
6107//=============================================================================
6108const AsciiString& Object::getCommandSetString() const
6109{
6110 if (m_commandSetStringOverride.isNotEmpty())
6111 return m_commandSetStringOverride;
6112
6113 return getTemplate()->friend_getCommandSetString();
6114}
6115
6116//=============================================================================
6117Bool Object::canProduceUpgrade( const UpgradeTemplate *upgrade )
6118{
6119 // We need to have the button to make the upgrade. CommandSets are a weird Logic/Client hybrid.
6120 const CommandSet *set = TheControlBar->findCommandSet(getCommandSetString());
6121
6122 for( Int buttonIndex = 0; buttonIndex < MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET; buttonIndex++ )
6123 {
6124 const CommandButton *button = set->getCommandButton(buttonIndex);
6125 if( button && button->getUpgradeTemplate() && (button->getUpgradeTemplate() == upgrade) )
6126 return TRUE; // getUpgradeTemplate only returns something if it is actually an upgrade
6127 }
6128
6129 return FALSE;// Cheatin' punk.
6130}
6131
6132//=============================================================================
6133// Object::defect, and related methods =
6134//=============================================================================
6135void Object::defect( Team* newTeam, UnsignedInt detectionTime )
6136{
6137 if ( isContained() ) //@todo (KRIS?) make contained units unselectable, until then... lorenzen
6138 {
6139 return;
6140 }
6141
6142 Player *player = getControllingPlayer();
6143 if ( !player )
6144 return;
6145
6146 Team* myTeam = player->getDefaultTeam();
6147 if ( myTeam == newTeam ) // can't defect from my own team, that would be silly
6148 return;
6149
6150 // things that are under construction, or sold, cannot defect.
6151 if (testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION) ||
6152 testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD))
6153 {
6154 return;
6155 }
6156
6157 // Before switch ////////////////////////////////////////
6158
6159 //Design says:
6160 ProductionUpdateInterface *production = getProductionUpdateInterface();
6161 if ( production )
6162 {
6163 production->cancelAndRefundAllProduction();
6164 }
6165
6166 // pop it up on the radar, so as to warn those who care
6167 // do this first, since after setTeam() the infiltrator
6168 // becomes the controllingplayer, not me
6169
6170 // But don't do this is if the new team is not a real team. "'Enemy' infiltration" wouldn't make
6171 // sense, and we are probably just reverting a cave or something.
6172 if( friend_getRadarData() && newTeam->getControllingPlayer()->isPlayableSide() && myTeam->getControllingPlayer()->isPlayableSide())
6173 {
6174 TheRadar->tryInfiltrationEvent( this );
6175 }
6176
6177 friend_setUndetectedDefector( detectionTime > 0 );
6178
6179 if (m_defectionHelper)
6180 m_defectionHelper->startDefectionTimer(detectionTime);
6181
6182 // Switch ////////////////////////////////////////
6183 setTeam( newTeam );
6184
6185 // After switch ////////////////////////////////////////
6186
6187 AIUpdateInterface *ai = getAI();
6188
6189 handlePartitionCellMaintenance();// to clear the shoud for my new master
6190
6191 if ( ai )
6192 {
6193 ai->aiIdle( CMD_FROM_AI );
6194 }
6195
6196 // Play our sound indicating we've been defected. (weird verbage, but true.)
6197 AudioEventRTS voiceDefect = *getTemplate()->getVoiceDefect();
6198 voiceDefect.setObjectID(getID());
6199 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&voiceDefect);
6200
6201 //make the new recruit the only selected thing, awaiting new command to move, attack, etc...
6202 Drawable *dr = getDrawable();
6203 if (dr)
6204 {
6205 dr->flashAsSelected(); //This is the first of several flashes which get cue'd by doDefectorUpdateStuff()
6206 AudioEventRTS defectorTimerSound = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_defectorTimerTickSound;
6207 defectorTimerSound.setObjectID( getID() );
6208 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&defectorTimerSound);
6209 }
6210
6211 ContainModuleInterface *ct = getContain();
6212 if( ct && ct->isKickOutOnCapture() )
6213 {
6214 // Caves really really don't want to do this.
6215 ct->removeAllContained( TRUE );
6216 }
6217
6218 // if it has parking places, defect anything parked there.
6219 for (BehaviorModule** i = getBehaviorModules(); *i; ++i)
6220 {
6221 ParkingPlaceBehaviorInterface* pp = (*i)->getParkingPlaceBehaviorInterface();
6222 if (pp)
6223 {
6224 pp->defectAllParkedUnits(newTeam, detectionTime);
6225 break;
6226 }
6227 }
6228
6229 // defect any mines that are owned by this structure, right now.
6230 // unfortunately, structures don't keep list of mines they own, so we must do
6231 // this the hard way :-( [fortunately, this doens't happen very often, so this
6232 // is probably an acceptable, if icky, solution.] (srj)
6233 for (Object* mine = TheGameLogic->getFirstObject(); mine; mine = mine->getNextObject())
6234 {
6235 if (mine->isKindOf(KINDOF_MINE))
6236 {
6237 if (mine->getProducerID() == this->getID())
6238 {
6239 mine->setTeam(newTeam);
6240 }
6241 }
6242 }
6243
6244}
6245
6246//=============================================================================
6247// Object::goInvulnerable
6248//=============================================================================
6249void Object::goInvulnerable( UnsignedInt time )
6250{
6251 const Bool WITHOUT_DEFECTOR_FX = FALSE;
6252
6253
6254 friend_setUndetectedDefector( time > 0 );
6255
6256 if (m_defectionHelper)
6257 m_defectionHelper->startDefectionTimer(time, WITHOUT_DEFECTOR_FX);
6258
6259}
6260
6261// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6263// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6264RadarPriorityType Object::getRadarPriority( void ) const
6265{
6266 RadarPriorityType priority = RADAR_PRIORITY_INVALID;
6267
6268 // first, get the priority at the thing template level
6269 priority = getTemplate()->getDefaultRadarPriority();
6270
6271 //
6272 // there are some objects that we want to show up on the radar when they have
6273 // certain properties ... here we will check for those properties unless the INI
6274 // setting of "not on radar" has been manually entered which explicitly forbids an
6275 // object from being on the radar ... by default objects get an "invalid" priority
6276 // on the radar and this means that we are free to decide one here if we want
6277 //
6278 if( priority == RADAR_PRIORITY_INVALID )
6279 {
6280
6281 // objects that are "garrisonable" show up on the radar
6282 ContainModuleInterface *cmi = getContain();
6283 if( cmi && cmi->isGarrisonable() )
6284 priority = RADAR_PRIORITY_STRUCTURE;
6285
6286 // objects that are "capturable" show up on the radar
6287 if( isKindOf( KINDOF_CAPTURABLE ) )
6288 priority = RADAR_PRIORITY_STRUCTURE;
6289
6290
6291 } // end if
6292
6293 // Carbombs will show up as units regardless of their default priority
6294 if ( testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_IS_CARBOMB ) )
6295 priority = RADAR_PRIORITY_UNIT;
6296
6297
6298 // return the priority we're going to use
6299 return priority;
6300
6301} // end getRadarPriority
6302
6303// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6304AIGroup *Object::getGroup(void)
6305{
6306 return m_group;
6307}
6308
6309//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6310void Object::enterGroup( AIGroup *group )
6311{
6312// DEBUG_LOG(("***AIGROUP %x involved in enterGroup on %x\n", group, this));
6313 // if we are in another group, remove ourselves from it first
6314 leaveGroup();
6315
6316 m_group = group;
6317}
6318
6319//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6320void Object::leaveGroup( void )
6321{
6322// DEBUG_LOG(("***AIGROUP %x involved in leaveGroup on %x\n", m_group, this));
6323 // if we are in a group, remove ourselves from it
6324 if (m_group)
6325 {
6326 // to avoid recursion, set m_group to NULL before removing
6327 AIGroup *group = m_group;
6328 m_group = NULL;
6329 group->remove( this );
6330 }
6331}
6332
6333//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6334Real Object::getCarrierDeckHeight() const
6335{
6336 Object *producer = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID( getProducerID() );
6337 if( producer )
6338 {
6339 // Find a parking place behavior.
6340 for( BehaviorModule** i = producer->getBehaviorModules(); *i; ++i )
6341 {
6342 ParkingPlaceBehaviorInterface* pp = (*i)->getParkingPlaceBehaviorInterface();
6343 if( pp )
6344 {
6345 return pp->getLandingDeckHeightOffset();
6346 }
6347 }
6348 }
6349 return 0.0f;
6350}
6351
6352//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6353CountermeasuresBehaviorInterface* Object::getCountermeasuresBehaviorInterface()
6354{
6355 for( BehaviorModule** i = getBehaviorModules(); *i; ++i )
6356 {
6357 CountermeasuresBehaviorInterface* cbi = (*i)->getCountermeasuresBehaviorInterface();
6358 if( cbi )
6359 {
6360 return cbi;
6361 }
6362 }
6363 return NULL;
6364}
6365
6366//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6367const CountermeasuresBehaviorInterface* Object::getCountermeasuresBehaviorInterface() const
6368{
6369 for( BehaviorModule** i = getBehaviorModules(); *i; ++i )
6370 {
6371 const CountermeasuresBehaviorInterface* cbi = (*i)->getCountermeasuresBehaviorInterface();
6372 if( cbi )
6373 {
6374 return cbi;
6375 }
6376 }
6377 return NULL;
6378}
6379
6380//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6381Bool Object::hasCountermeasures() const
6382{
6383 const CountermeasuresBehaviorInterface* cbi = getCountermeasuresBehaviorInterface();
6384 if( cbi && cbi->isActive() )
6385 {
6386 return TRUE;
6387 }
6388 return FALSE;
6389}
6390
6391//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6392void Object::reportMissileForCountermeasures( Object *missile )
6393{
6394 for( BehaviorModule** i = getBehaviorModules(); *i; ++i )
6395 {
6396 CountermeasuresBehaviorInterface* cbi = (*i)->getCountermeasuresBehaviorInterface();
6397 if( cbi )
6398 {
6399 cbi->reportMissileForCountermeasures( missile );
6400 }
6401 }
6402}
6403
6404//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6405ObjectID Object::calculateCountermeasureToDivertTo( const Object& victim )
6406{
6407 AIUpdateInterface *ai = getAI();
6408 if( ai )
6409 {
6410 for( BehaviorModule** i = victim.getBehaviorModules(); *i; ++i )
6411 {
6412 CountermeasuresBehaviorInterface* cbi = (*i)->getCountermeasuresBehaviorInterface();
6413 if( cbi )
6414 {
6415 ObjectID decoyID = cbi->calculateCountermeasureToDivertTo( victim );
6416 return decoyID;
6417 }
6418 }
6419 }
6420 return INVALID_ID;
6421}
